verses.translation: Say. 'Truth has come; falsehood originates not, nor brings again.'

verses.content: قُلْ إِن ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَا أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِي ۖ وَإِنِ اهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِي إِلَيَّ رَبِّي ۚ إِنَّهُ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ
verses.translation: Say: 'If I go astray, I go astray only to my own loss; if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. He is All-hearing, Ever-nigh.'

verses.content: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذْ فَزِعُوا فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: Ah, if thou couldst see when they are terrified, and there is no escape, and they are seized from a place near at hand,

verses.content: وَقَالُوا آمَنَّا بِهِ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: and they say, 'We believe in it'; but how can they reach from a place far away,

verses.content: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا بِهِ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ مِن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: seeing they disbelieved in it before, guessing at the Unseen from a place far away?

verses.content: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا فِي شَكٍّ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And a barrier is set between them and that they desire, as was done with the likes of them aforetime; they were in doubt disquieting.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ جَاعِلِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُولِي أَجْنِحَةٍ مَّثْنَىٰ وَثُلَاثَ وَرُبَاعَ ۚ يَزِيدُ فِي الْخَلْقِ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: Praise belongs to God, Originator of the heavens and earth, who appointed the angels to be messengers having wings two, three and four, increasing creation as He wills. Surely God is powerful over everything.

verses.content: مَّا يَفْتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِن رَّحْمَةٍ فَلَا مُمْسِكَ لَهَا ۖ وَمَا يُمْسِكْ فَلَا مُرْسِلَ لَهُ مِن بَعْدِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: Whatsoever mercy God opens to men, none can withhold and whatsoever He withholds, none can loose after Him. He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ هَلْ مِنْ خَالِقٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
verses.translation: O men, remember God's blessing upon you; is there any creator, apart from God, who provides for you out of heaven and earth? There is no god but He: how then are you perverted?

verses.content: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
verses.translation: If they cry lies to thee, Messengers before thee were cried lies to; and unto God all matters are returned.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
verses.translation: O men, God's promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.

verses.content: إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّا ۚ إِنَّمَا يَدْعُو حِزْبَهُ لِيَكُونُوا مِنْ أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
verses.translation: Surely Satan is an enemy to you; so take him for an enemy. He calls his party only that they may be among the inhabitants of the Blaze.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieve -- there awaits them a terrible chastisement; but those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness -- theirs shall be forgiveness and a great wage.

verses.content: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ فَرَآهُ حَسَنًا ۖ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ فَلَا تَذْهَبْ نَفْسُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسَرَاتٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ
verses.translation: And what of him, the evil of whose deeds has been decked out fair to him, so that he thinks it is good? God leads astray whomsoever He will, and whomsoever He will He guides; so let not thy soul be wasted in regrets for them; God has knowledge of the things they work.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ الرِّيَاحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابًا فَسُقْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٍ مَّيِّتٍ فَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ النُّشُورُ
verses.translation: God is He that looses the winds, that stir up cloud, then We drive it to a dead land and therewith revive the earth, after it is dead. Even so is the Uprising.

verses.content: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
verses.translation: Whosoever desires glory, the glory altogether belongs to God. To Him good words go up, and the righteous deed -- He uplifts it; but those who devise evil deeds -- theirs shall be a terrible chastisement, and their devising shall come to naught.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ۚ وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ ۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٍ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: God created you of dust then of a sperm-drop, then He made you pairs. No female bears or brings forth, save with His knowledge; and none is given long life who is given long life neither is any diminished in his life, but it is in a Book. Surely that is easy for God.

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْبَحْرَانِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ سَائِغٌ شَرَابُهُ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ ۖ وَمِن كُلٍّ تَأْكُلُونَ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُونَ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا ۖ وَتَرَى الْفُلْكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبْتَغُوا مِن فَضْلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: Not equal are the two seas; this is sweet, grateful to taste, delicious to drink, and that is salt, bitter to the tongue. Yet of both you eat fresh flesh, and bring forth out of it ornaments for you to wear; and thou mayest see the ships cleaving through it, that you may seek of His bounty, and so haply you will be thankful.

verses.content: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ مَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِن قِطْمِيرٍ
verses.translation: He makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night, and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each of them running to a stated term. That is God, your Lord; to Him belongs the Kingdom; and those you call upon, apart from Him, possess not so much as the skin of a date-stone.

verses.content: إِن تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا دُعَاءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا مَا اسْتَجَابُوا لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ
verses.translation: If you call upon them, they will not hear your prayer, and if they heard, they would not answer you; and on the Day of Resurrection they will disown your partnership. None can tell thee like One who is aware.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ أَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: O men, you are the ones that have need of God; He is the All-sufficient, the All-laudable.

verses.content: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: If He will, He can put you away and bring a new creation;

verses.content: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٍ
verses.translation: that is surely no great matter for God.

verses.content: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَإِن تَدْعُ مُثْقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمْلِهَا لَا يُحْمَلْ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَيْبِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفْسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: No soul laden bears the load of another; and if one heavy-burdened calls for its load to be carried, not a thing of it will be carried, though he be a near kinsman. Thou warnest only those who fear their Lord in the Unseen and perform the prayer; and whosoever purifies himself, purifies himself only for his own soul's good. To God is the homecoming.

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Not equal are the blind and the seeing man,

verses.content: وَلَا الظُّلُمَاتُ وَلَا النُّورُ
verses.translation: the shadows and the light,

verses.content: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الْحَرُورُ
verses.translation: the shade and the torrid heat;

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَحْيَاءُ وَلَا الْأَمْوَاتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَّن فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: not equal are the living and the dead. God makes to hear whomsoever He will; thou canst not make those in their tombs to hear -

verses.content: إِنْ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: thou art naught but a warner.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: Surely We have sent thee with the truth good tidings to bear, and warning; not a nation there is, but there has passed away in it a warner.

verses.content: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالْكِتَابِ الْمُنِيرِ
verses.translation: If they cry thee lies, those before them also cried lies; their Messengers came to them with the clear signs, the Psalms, the Illuminating Book;

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: then I seized the unbelievers, and how was My horror!

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ
verses.translation: Hast thou not seen how that God sends down out of heaven water, and therewith We bring forth fruits of diverse hues? And in the mountains are streaks white and red, of diverse hues, and pitchy black;

verses.content: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ وَالدَّوَابِّ وَالْأَنْعَامِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهُ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: men too, and beasts and cattle -- diverse are their hues. Even so only those of His servants fear God who have knowledge; surely God is All-mighty, All-forgiving.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنفَقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَارَةً لَّن تَبُورَ
verses.translation: Surely those who recite the Book of God and perform the prayer, and expend of that We have provided them, secretly and in public, look for a commerce that comes not to naught,

verses.content: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: that He may pay them in full their wages and enrich them of His bounty; surely He is All-forgiving, All-thankful.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ هُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِ لَخَبِيرٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: And that We have revealed to thee of the Book is the truth, confirming what is before it; God is aware of and sees His servants.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا الْكِتَابَ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ وَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Then We bequeathed the Book on those of Our servants We chose; but of them some wrong themselves, some of them are lukewarm, and some are outstrippers in good works by the leave of God; that is the great bounty.

verses.content: جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
verses.translation: Gardens of Eden they shall enter; therein they shall be adorned with bracelets of gold and with pearls, and their apparel there shall be of silk.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: And they shall say, 'Praise belongs to God who has put away all sorrow from us. Surely our Lord is All-forgiving, All-thankful,

verses.content: الَّذِي أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ الْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ
verses.translation: who of His bounty has made us to dwell in the abode of everlasting life wherein no weariness assails us neither fatigue.'

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُم مِّنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٍ
verses.translation: As for the unbelievers, theirs shall be the fire of Gehenna; they shall neither be done with and die, nor shall its chastisement be lightened for them. Even so We recompense every ungrateful one.

verses.content: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَاءَكُمُ النَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا فَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
verses.translation: Therein they shall shout, 'Our Lord, bring us forth, and we will do righteousness, other than what we have done.' 'What, did We not give you long life, enough to remember in for him who would remember? To you the warner came; taste you now! The evildoers shall have no helper.'

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمُ غَيْبِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: God knows the Unseen in the heavens and the earth; He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَائِفَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: It is He who appointed you viceroys in the earth. So whosoever disbelieves, his unbelief shall be charged against him; their unbelief increases the disbelievers only in hate in God's sight; their unbelief increases the disbelievers only in loss.

verses.content: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ شُرَكَاءَكُمُ الَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُوا مِنَ الْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَابًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ الظَّالِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
verses.translation: Say: 'Have you considered your associates on whom you call, apart from God? Show me what they have created in the earth; or have they a partnership in the heavens?' Or have We given them a Book, so that they are upon a clear sign from it? Nay, but the evildoers promise one another naught but delusion.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَا إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا
verses.translation: God holds the heavens and the earth, lest they remove; did they remove, none would hold them after Him. Surely He is All-clement, All-forgiving.

verses.content: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِن جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
verses.translation: They have sworn by God the most earnest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more rightly guided than any one of the nations; but when a warner came to them, it increased them only in aversion,

verses.content: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
verses.translation: waxing proud in the land, and devising evil; but evil devising encompasses only those who do it; So do they expect anything but the wont of the ancients? And thou shalt never find any changing the Wont of God, and thou shalt never find any altering the wont of God.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِن شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: What, have they not journeyed in the land and beheld how was the end of those before them? They were stronger than themselves in might; but God -- there is naught in the heavens or the earth that can frustrate Him. Surely He is All-knowing, All-powerful.

verses.content: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَابَّةٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: If God should take men to task for what they have earned He would not leave upon the face of the earth one creature that crawls; but He is deferring them to a stated term. But when their term is come -- surely God sees His servants.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يس
verses.translation: Ya Sin

verses.content: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: By the Wise Koran,

verses.content: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: thou art truly among the Envoys

verses.content: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: on a straight path;

verses.content: تَنزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: the sending down of the All-mighty, the All-wise,

verses.content: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أُنذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
verses.translation: that thou mayest warn a people whose fathers were never warned, so they are heedless.

verses.content: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: The Word has been realised against most of them, yet they do not believe.

verses.content: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: Surely We have put on their necks fetters up to the chin, so their heads are raised;

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا مِن بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier; and We have covered them, so they do not see.

verses.content: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Alike it is to them whether thou hast warned them or thou hast not warned them, they do not believe.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Thou only warnest him who follows the Remembrance and who fears the All-merciful in the Unseen; so give him the good tidings of forgiveness and a generous wage.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Surely it is We who bring the dead to life and write down what they have forwarded and what they have left behind; everything We have numbered in a clear register.

verses.content: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Strike for them a similitude -- the inhabitants of the city, when the Envoys came to it;

verses.content: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: when We sent unto them two men, but they cried them lies, so We sent a third as reinforcement. They said, 'We are assuredly Envoys unto you.

verses.content: قَالُوا مَا أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنزَلَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, 'You are naught but mortals like us; the All-merciful has not sent down anything. You are speaking only lies.'

verses.content: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, 'Our Lord knows we are Envoys unto you;

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: and it is only for us to deliver the Manifest Message.'

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: They said, 'We augur ill of you. If you give not over, we will stone you and there shall visit you from us a painful chastisement.'

verses.content: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said, 'Your augury is with you; if you are reminded? But you are a prodigal people.'

verses.content: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Then came a man from the furthest part of the city, running; he said, 'My people, follow the Envoys!

verses.content: اتَّبِعُوا مَن لَّا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: Follow such as ask no wage of you, that are right-guided.

verses.content: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: And why should I not serve Him who originated me, and unto whom you shall be returned?

verses.content: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: What, shall I take, apart from Him, gods whose intercession, if the All-merciful desires affliction for me, shall not avail me anything, and who will never deliver me?

verses.content: إِنِّي إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Surely in that case I should be in manifest error.

verses.content: إِنِّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: Behold, I believe in your Lord; therefore hear me!'

verses.content: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said, 'Enter Paradise!' He said, 'Ah, would that my people had knowledge

verses.content: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: that my Lord has forgiven me and that He has placed me among the honoured.'

verses.content: وَمَا أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِن بَعْدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We sent not down upon his people, after him, any host out of heaven; neither would We send any down.

verses.content: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was only one Cry and lo, they were silent and still.

verses.content: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.translation: Ah, woe for those servants! Never comes unto them a Messenger, but they mock at him.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: What, have they not seen how many generations We have destroyed before them, and that it is not unto them that they return?

verses.content: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They shall every one of them be arraigned before Us.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the dead land, that We quickened and brought forth from it grain, whereof they eat;

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: and We made therein gardens of palms and vines, and therein We caused fountains to gush forth,

verses.content: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: that they might eat of its fruits and their hands' labour. What, will they not be thankful?

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Glory be to Him, who created all the pairs of what the earth produces, and of themselves, and of what they know not.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the night; We strip it of the day and lo, they are in darkness.

verses.content: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun -- it runs to a fixed resting-place; that is the ordaining of the All-mighty, the All-knowing.

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And the moon -- We have determined it by stations, till it returns like an aged palm-bough.

verses.content: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: It behoves not the sun to overtake the moon, neither does the night outstrip the day, each swimming in a sky.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is that We carried their seed in the laden ship,

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: and We have created for them the like of it whereon they ride;

verses.content: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: and if We will, We drown them, then none have they to cry to, neither are they delivered,

verses.content: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: save as a mercy from Us, and enjoyment for a while.

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, 'Fear what is before you and what is behind you; haply you will find mercy' --

verses.content: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ آيَةٍ مِّنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: yet never any sign of the signs of their Lord comes to them, but they are turning away from it.

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, 'Expend of that God has provided you,' the unbelievers say to the believers, 'What, shall we feed such a one whom, if God willed, He would feed? You are only in manifest error!'

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: They also say, 'When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak truly?'

verses.content: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: They are awaiting only for one Cry to seize them while they are yet disputing,

verses.content: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: then they will not be able to make any testament, nor will they return to their people.

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: And the Trumpet shall be blown; then behold, they are sliding down from their tombs unto their Lord.

verses.content: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَن بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They say, 'Alas for us! Who roused us out of our sleeping place? This is what the All-merciful promised, and the Envoys spoke truly.'

verses.content: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: 'It was only one Cry; then behold, they are all arraigned before Us.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: So today no soul shall be wronged anything, and you shall not be recompensed, except according to what you have been doing.

verses.content: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
verses.translation: See, the inhabitants of Paradise today are busy in their rejoicing,

verses.content: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
verses.translation: they and their spouses, reclining upon couches in the shade;

verses.content: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: therein they have fruits, and they have all that they call for.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: 'Peace!' -- such is the greeting, from a Lord All-compassionate.

verses.content: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: 'Now keep yourselves apart, you sinners, upon this day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Made I not covenant with you, Children of Adam, that you should not serve Satan -- surely he is a manifest foe to you --

verses.content: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: and that you should serve Me? This is a straight path.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: He led astray many a throng of you; did you not understand?

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: This is Gehenna, then, the same that you were promised;

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: roast well in it today, for that you were unbelievers!'

verses.content: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Today We set a seal on their mouths, and their hands speak to Us, and their feet bear witness as to what they have been earning.

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Did We will, We would have obliterated their eyes, then they would race to the path, but how would they see?

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Did We will, We would have changed them where they were, then they could not go on, nor could they return.

verses.content: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And to whomsoever We give long life, We bend him over in His constitution; what, do they not understand?

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: We have not taught him poetry; it is not seemly for him. It is only a Remembrance and a Clear Koran,

verses.content: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: that he may warn whosoever is living, and that the Word may be realized against the unbelievers.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not seen how that We have created for them of that Our hands wrought cattle that they own?

verses.content: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: We have subdued them to them, and some of them they ride, and some they eat;

verses.content: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: other uses also they have in them, and beverages. What, will they not be thankful?

verses.content: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: Yet they have taken, apart from God, gods; haply they might be helped.

verses.content: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They cannot help them, though they be hosts made ready for them.

verses.content: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: So do not let their saying grieve thee; assuredly We know what they keep secret and what they publish.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Has not man regarded how that We created him of a sperm-drop? Then lo, he is a manifest adversary.

verses.content: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he has struck for Us a similitude and forgotten his creation; he says, 'Who shall quicken the bones when they are decayed?'

verses.content: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: 'He shall quicken them, who originated them the first time; He knows all creation,

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: who has made for you out of the green tree fire and lo, from it you kindle.'

verses.content: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Is not He, who created the heavens and earth, able to create the like of them? Yes indeed; He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: His command, when He desires a thing, is to say to it 'Be,' and it is.

verses.content: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: So glory be to Him, in whose hand is the dominion of everything, and unto whom you shall be returned.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
verses.translation: By the rangers ranging

verses.content: فَالزَّاجِرَاتِ زَجْرًا
verses.translation: and the scarers scaring

verses.content: فَالتَّالِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: and the reciters of a Remembrance,

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَاحِدٌ
verses.translation: surely your God is One,

verses.content: رَّبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and of what between them is Lord of the Easts.

verses.content: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.translation: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars

verses.content: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَّارِدٍ
verses.translation: and to preserve against every rebel Satan;

verses.content: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.translation: they listen not to the High Council, for they are pelted from every side,

verses.content: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
verses.translation: rejected, and theirs is an everlasting chastisement,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.translation: except such as snatches a fragment, and he is pursued by a piercing flame.

verses.content: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍ
verses.translation: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Are they stronger in constitution, or those We created? We created them of clinging clay.

verses.content: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, thou marvellest; and they scoff

verses.content: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: and, when reminded, do not remember

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا آيَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
verses.translation: and, when they see a sign, would scoff;

verses.content: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: and they say, 'This is nothing but manifest sorcery.

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be raised up?

verses.content: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: What, and our fathers, the ancients?'

verses.content: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَاخِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say: 'Yes, and in all lowliness.'

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: For it is only a single scaring, then behold, they are watching

verses.content: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: and they say, 'Woe, alas for us! This is the Day of Doom.'

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: 'This is the Day of Decision, even that you cried lies to.

verses.content: احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: Muster those who did evil, their wives, and that they were serving,

verses.content: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: apart from God, and guide them unto the path of Hell!

verses.content: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْئُولُونَ
verses.translation: And halt them, to be questioned:

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
verses.translation: "Why help you not one another?"

verses.content: بَلْ هُمُ الْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but today they resign themselves in submission

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: and advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: These say, 'Why, you of old would come to us from the right hand.'

verses.content: قَالُوا بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Those say, 'No; on the contrary, you were not believers;

verses.content: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
verses.translation: we had no authority over you; no, you were an insolent people.

verses.content: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
verses.translation: So our Lord's Word is realised against us; we are tasting it.

verses.content: فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَاوِينَ
verses.translation: Therefore we perverted you, and we ourselves were perverts.'

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.translation: So all of them on that day are sharers in the chastisement.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Even so We do with the sinners;

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.translation: for when it was said to them, 'There is no god but God,' they were ever waxing proud,

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: saying, 'What, shall we forsake our gods for a poet possessed?'

verses.content: بَلْ جَاءَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: 'No indeed; but he brought the truth, and confirmed the Envoys.

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَائِقُو الْعَذَابِ الْأَلِيمِ
verses.translation: Now certainly you shall be tasting the painful chastisement,

verses.content: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: and not be recompensed, except according to what you were doing.'

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except for God's sincere servants;

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: for them awaits a known provision,

verses.content: فَوَاكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: fruits -- and they high-honoured

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: in the Gardens of Bliss

verses.content: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.translation: upon couches, set face to face,

verses.content: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: a cup from a spring being passed round to them,

verses.content: بَيْضَاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ
verses.translation: white, a delight to the drinkers,

verses.content: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.translation: wherein no sickness is, neither intoxication;

verses.content: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
verses.translation: and with them wide-eyed maidens restraining their glances

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: as if they were hidden pearls.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

verses.content: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
verses.translation: One of them says, 'I had a comrade

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُصَدِّقِينَ
verses.translation: who would say, "Are you a confirmer?

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.translation: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be requited?"

verses.content: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
verses.translation: He says, 'Are you looking down?'

verses.content: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ فِي سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then he looks, and sees him in the midst of Hell.

verses.content: قَالَ تَاللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
verses.translation: He says, 'By God, wellnigh thou didst destroy me;

verses.content: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.translation: But for my Lord's blessing, I were one of the arraigned.

verses.content: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
verses.translation: What, do we then not die

verses.content: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: except for our first death, and are we not chastised?

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: This is indeed the mighty triumph,

verses.content: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ الْعَامِلُونَ
verses.translation: for the like of this let the workers work.'

verses.content: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Is that better as a hospitality, or the Tree of Ez-Zakkoum?

verses.content: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: We have appointed it as a trial for the evildoers.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: It is a tree that comes forth in the root of Hell;

verses.content: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُ رُءُوسُ الشَّيَاطِينِ
verses.translation: its spathes are as the heads of Satans,

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: and they eat of it, and of it fill their bellies,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: then on top of it they have a brew of boiling water,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: then their return is unto Hell.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا آبَاءَهُمْ ضَالِّينَ
verses.translation: They found their fathers erring,

verses.content: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
verses.translation: and they run in their footsteps.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Before them erred most of the ancients,

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: and We sent among them warners;

verses.content: فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: and behold, how was the end of them that were warned,

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: except for God's sincere servants.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ نَادَانَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ الْمُجِيبُونَ
verses.translation: Noah called to Us; and how excellent were the Answerers!

verses.content: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We delivered him and his people from the great distress,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ هُمُ الْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: and We made his seed the survivors,

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and left for him among the later folk

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: 'Peace be upon Noah among all beings!'

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: he was among Our believing servants.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِ لَإِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: Of his party was also Abraham;

verses.content: إِذْ جَاءَ رَبَّهُ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: when he came unto his Lord with a pure heart,

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: when he said to his father and his folk, 'What do you serve?

verses.content: أَئِفْكًا آلِهَةً دُونَ اللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Is it a calumny, gods apart from God, that you desire?

verses.content: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: What think you then of the Lord of all Being?'

verses.content: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِي النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And he cast a glance at the stars,

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: and he said, 'Surely I am sick.'

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.translation: But they went away from him, turning their backs.

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: Then he turned to their gods, and said, 'What do you eat?

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: What ails you, that you speak not?'

verses.content: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًا بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: And he turned upon them smiting them with his right hand.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلُوا إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
verses.translation: Then came the others to him hastening.

verses.content: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
verses.translation: He said, 'Do you serve what you hew,

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: and God created you and what you make?'

verses.content: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They said, 'Build him a building, and cast him into the furnace!'

verses.content: فَأَرَادُوا بِهِ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَاهُمُ الْأَسْفَلِينَ
verses.translation: They desired to outwit him; so We made them the lower ones.

verses.content: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: He said, 'I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.

verses.content: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: My Lord, give me one of the righteous.'

verses.content: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِغُلَامٍ حَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then We gave him the good tidings of a prudent boy;

verses.content: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
verses.translation: and when he had reached the age of running with him, he said, 'My son, I see in a dream that I shall sacrifice thee; consider, what thinkest thou?' He said, 'My father, do as thou art bidden; thou shalt find me, God willing, one of the steadfast.'

verses.content: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ
verses.translation: When they had surrendered, and he flung him upon his brow,

verses.content: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَن يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ
verses.translation: We called unto him, 'Abraham,

verses.content: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: thou hast confirmed the vision; even so We recompense the good-doers.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: This is indeed the manifest trial.'

verses.content: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And We ransomed him with a mighty sacrifice,

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and left for him among the later folk

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: 'Peace be upon Abraham!'

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: he was among Our believing servants.

verses.content: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: Then We gave him the good tidings of Isaac, a Prophet, one of the righteous.

verses.content: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We blessed him, and Isaac; and of their seed some are good-doers, and some manifest self-wrongers.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: We also favoured Moses and Aaron,

verses.content: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: and We delivered them and their people from the great distress.

verses.content: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We helped them, so that they were the victors;

verses.content: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ
verses.translation: and We gave them the Manifesting Book,

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: and guided them in the straight path,

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and left for them among the later folk

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: 'Peace be upon Moses and, Aaron!'

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

verses.content: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: they were among Our believing servants.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Elias too was one of the Envoys;

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: when he said to his people, 'Will you not be godfearing?

verses.content: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ
verses.translation: Do you call on Baal, and abandon the Best of creators?

verses.content: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients?'

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: But they cried him lies; so they will be among the arraigned,

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: except for God's sincere servants;

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and We left for him among the later folk

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
verses.translation: 'Peace be upon Elias!'

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: he was among Our believing servants.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Lot too was one of the Envoys;

verses.content: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: when We delivered him and his people all together,

verses.content: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.translation: save an old woman among those that tarried;

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: then We destroyed the others,

verses.content: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: and you pass by them in the morning

verses.content: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: and in the night; will you not understand?

verses.content: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Jonah too was one of the Envoys;

verses.content: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: when he ran away to the laden ship

verses.content: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ
verses.translation: and cast lots, and was of the rebutted,

verses.content: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: then the whale swallowed him down, and he blameworthy.

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ
verses.translation: Now had he not been of those that glorify God,

verses.content: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: he would have tarried in its belly until the day they shall be raised;

verses.content: فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: but We cast him upon the wilderness, and he was sick,

verses.content: وَأَنبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ
verses.translation: and We caused to grow over him a tree of gourds.

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Then We sent him unto a hundred thousand, or more,

verses.content: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: and they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.

verses.content: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Has thy Lord daughters, and they sons?

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: Or did We create the angels females, while they were witnesses?

verses.content: أَلَا إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Is it not of their own calumny that they say,

verses.content: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: 'God has begotten?' They are truly liars.

verses.content: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Has He chosen daughters above sons?

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: What ails you then, how you judge?

verses.content: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: What, and will you not remember?

verses.content: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Or have you a clear authority?

verses.content: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Bring your Book, if you speak truly!

verses.content: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They have set up a kinship between Him and the jinn; and the jinn know that they shall be arraigned.

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Glory be to God above that they describe,

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: except for God's sincere servants.

verses.content: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: But as for you, and that you serve,

verses.content: مَا أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ
verses.translation: you shall not tempt any against Him

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: except him who shall roast in Hell.

verses.content: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: None of us is there, but has a known station;

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ
verses.translation: we are the rangers,

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: we are they that give glory.

verses.content: وَإِن كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: What though they would say,

verses.content: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: 'If only we had had a Reminder from the ancients,

verses.content: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: then were we God's sincere servants.'

verses.content: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: But they disbelieved in it; soon they shall know!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Already Our Word has preceded to Our servants, the Envoys;

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنصُورُونَ
verses.translation: assuredly they shall be helped,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.translation: and Our host -- they are the victors.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So turn thou from them for a while,

verses.content: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and see them; soon they shall see!

verses.content: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: What, do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?

verses.content: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: When it lights in their courtyard, how evil will be the morning of them that are warned!

verses.content: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So turn thou from them for a while,

verses.content: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and see; soon they shall see!

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Glory be to thy Lord, the Lord of Glory, above that they describe!

verses.content: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And peace be upon the Envoys;

verses.content: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: and praise belongs to God, the Lord of all Being.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Sad. By the Koran, containing the Remembrance --

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.translation: nay, but the unbelievers glory in their schism.

verses.content: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.translation: How many a generation We destroyed before them, and they called, but time was none to escape.

verses.content: وَعَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: Now they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, 'This is a lying sorcerer.

verses.content: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.translation: What, has he made the gods One God? This is indeed a marvellous thing.'

verses.content: وَانطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: And the Council of them depart, saying 'Go! Be steadfast to your gods; this is a thing to be desired.

verses.content: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
verses.translation: We have not heard of this in the last religion; this is surely an invention.

verses.content: أَأُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِن بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِي ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
verses.translation: What, has the Remembrance been sent down on him out of us all?' Nay, but they are in doubt of My Remembrance; nay, they have not yet tasted My chastisement.

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or have they the treasuries of thy Lord's mercy, the All-mighty, the All-giving?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
verses.translation: Or is theirs the kingdom of the heavens and earth and of what between them is? Why, then let them ascend the cords!

verses.content: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: A very host of parties is routed there!

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: Cried lies before them the people of Noah, and Ad, and Pharaoh, he of the tent-pegs,

verses.content: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: and Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the men of the Thicket - those were the parties;

verses.content: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: not one, that cried not lies to the Messengers, so My retribution was just.

verses.content: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.translation: These are only awaiting for a single Cry, to which there is no delay.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: They say, 'Our Lord, hasten to us our share before the Day of Reckoning.'

verses.content: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Bear patiently what they say, and remember Our servant David, the man of might; he was a penitent.

verses.content: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: With him We subjected the mountains to give glory at evening and sunrise,

verses.content: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: and the birds, duly mustered, every one to him reverting;

verses.content: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and speech decisive.

verses.content: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: Has the tiding of the dispute come to thee? When they scaled the Sanctuary,

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
verses.translation: when they entered upon David, and he took fright at them; and they said, 'Fear not; two disputants we are -- one of us has injured the other; so judge between us justly, and transgress not, and guide us to the right path.'

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: 'Behold, this my brother has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe. So he said, "Give her into my charge"; and he overcame me in the argument.'

verses.content: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.translation: Said he, 'Assuredly he has wronged thee in asking for thy ewe in addition to his sheep; and indeed many intermixers do injury one against the other, save those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness -- and how few they are!' And David thought that We had only tried him; therefore he sought forgiveness of his Lord, and he fell down, bowing, and he repented.

verses.content: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: Accordingly We forgave him that, and he has a near place in Our presence and a fair resort.

verses.content: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: 'David, behold, We have appointed thee a viceroy in the earth; therefore judge between men justly, and follow not caprice, lest it lead thee astray from the way of God. Surely those who go astray from the way of God -- there awaits them a terrible chastisement, for that they have forgotten the Day of Reckoning.'

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
verses.translation: We have not created the heavens and earth, and what between them is, for vanity; such is the thought of the unbelievers, wherefore woe unto the unbelievers because of the Fire!

verses.content: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Or shall We make those who believe and do righteous deeds as the workers of corruption in the earth, or shall We make the godfearing as the transgressors?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ أَنزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: A Book We have sent down to thee, Blessed, that men possessed of minds may ponder its signs and so remember.

verses.content: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And We gave unto David Solomon; how excellent a servant he was! He was a penitent.

verses.content: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: When in the evening were presented to him the standing steeds,

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: he said, 'Lo, I have loved the love of good things better than the remembrance of my Lord, until the sun was bidden behind the veil.

verses.content: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: Return them to me!' And he began to stroke their shanks and necks.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: Certainly We tried Solomon, and We cast upon his throne a mere body; then he repented.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَّا يَنبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said, 'My Lord, forgive me, and give me a kingdom such as may not befall anyone after me; surely Thou art the All-giver.'

verses.content: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: So We subjected to him the wind, that ran at his commandment, softly, wherever he might light on,

verses.content: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.translation: and the Satans, every builder and diver

verses.content: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: and others also, coupled in fetters:

verses.content: هَـٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: 'This is Our gift; bestow or withhold without reckoning.'

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: And he had a near place in Our presence and a fair resort.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Remember also Our servant Job; when he called to his Lord, 'Behold, Satan has visited me with weariness and chastisement.'

verses.content: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.translation: 'Stamp thy foot! This is a laving-place cool, and a drink.'

verses.content: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: And We gave to him his family, and the like of them with them, as a mercy from us, and a reminder unto men possessed of minds;

verses.content: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِب بِّهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: and, 'Take in thy hand a bundle of rushes, and strike therewith, and do not fail in thy oath.' Surely We found him a steadfast man. How excellent a servant he was! He was a penitent.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: Remember also Our servants Abraham, Isaac and Jacob -- men of might they and of vision.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
verses.translation: Assuredly We purified them with a quality most pure, the remembrance of the Abode,

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: and in Our sight they are of the chosen, the excellent.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: Remember also Our servants Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhul Kifl; each is among the excellent.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: This is a Remembrance; and for the godfearing is a fair resort,

verses.content: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
verses.translation: Gardens of Eden, whereof the gates are open to them,

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.translation: wherein they recline, and wherein they call for fruits abundant, and sweet potions,

verses.content: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: and with them maidens restraining their glances of equal age.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: 'This is what you were promised for the Day of Reckoning;

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: this is Our provision, unto which there is no end.'

verses.content: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: All this; but for the insolent awaits an ill resort,

verses.content: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
verses.translation: Gehenna, wherein they are roasted - an evil cradling!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.translation: All this; so let them taste it - boiling water and pus,

verses.content: وَآخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ
verses.translation: and other torments of the like kind coupled together.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ
verses.translation: 'This is a troop rushing in with you; there is no Welcome for them; they shall roast in the Fire.'

verses.content: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
verses.translation: They say, 'No, it is you have no Welcome; you forwarded it for us; how evil a stablishment!'

verses.content: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ
verses.translation: They say, 'Our Lord, whoso forwarded this for us, give him a double chastisement in the Fire!'

verses.content: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ الْأَشْرَارِ
verses.translation: They say, 'How is it with us, that we do not see men here that we counted among the wicked?

verses.content: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ
verses.translation: What, did we take them for a laughing-stock? Or have our eyes swerved away from them?'

verses.content: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
verses.translation: Surely that is true -- the disputing of the inhabitants of the Fire.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Say: 'I am only a warner. There is not any god but God, the One, the Omnipotent,

verses.content: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and earth, and of what between them is, the All-mighty, the All-forgiving.'

verses.content: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: 'It is a mighty tiding

verses.content: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: from which you are turning away.

verses.content: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ بِالْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: I had no knowledge of the High Council when they disputed.

verses.content: إِن يُوحَىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلَّا أَنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: This alone is revealed to me, that I am only a clear warner.'

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي خَالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: When thy Lord said to the angels, 'See, I am creating a mortal of a clay.

verses.content: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُوا لَهُ سَاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: When I have shaped him, and breathed My spirit in him, fall you down, bowing before him!'

verses.content: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: Then the angels bowed themselves all together,

verses.content: إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ اسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: save Iblis; he waxed proud, and was one of the unbelievers.

verses.content: قَالَ يَا إِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ الْعَالِينَ
verses.translation: Said He, 'Iblis, what prevented thee to bow thyself before that I created with My own hands? Hast thou waxed proud, or art thou of the lofty ones?'

verses.content: قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِي مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِن طِينٍ
verses.translation: Said he, 'I am better than he; Thou createdst me of fire, and him Thou createdst of clay.'

verses.content: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.translation: Said He, 'Then go thou forth hence; thou art accursed.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Upon thee shall rest My curse, till the Day of Doom.'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: Said he, 'My Lord, respite me till the day they shall be raised.'

verses.content: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: Said He, 'Thou art among the ones that are respited

verses.content: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُومِ
verses.translation: until the day of the known time.'

verses.content: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Said he, 'Now, by Thy glory, I shall pervert them all together,

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: excepting those Thy servants among them that are sincere.'

verses.content: قَالَ فَالْحَقُّ وَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.translation: Said He, 'This is the truth, and the truth I say;

verses.content: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: I shall assuredly fill Gehenna with thee, and with whosoever of them follows thee, all together.'

verses.content: قُلْ مَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Say: 'I ask of you no wage for it, neither am I of those who take things upon themselves.

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is nothing but a reminder unto all beings,

verses.content: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُ بَعْدَ حِينٍ
verses.translation: and you shall surely know its tiding after a while.'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَنزِيلُ الْكِتَابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: The sending down of the Book is from God the All-mighty, the All-wise.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَا إِلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ فَاعْبُدِ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ الدِّينَ
verses.translation: We have sent down to thee the Book with the truth; so worship God, making thy religion His sincerely.

verses.content: أَلَا لِلَّهِ الدِّينُ الْخَالِصُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ اتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِهِ أَوْلِيَاءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَا إِلَى اللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِي مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِي مَنْ هُوَ كَاذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
verses.translation: Belongs not sincere religion to God? And those who take protectors, apart from Him -- 'We only serve them that they may bring us nigh in nearness to God' -- surely God shall judge between them touching that whereon they are at variance. Surely God guides not him who is a liar, unthankful.

verses.content: لَّوْ أَرَادَ اللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّاصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ سُبْحَانَهُ ۖ هُوَ اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Had God desired to take to Him a son, He would have chosen whatever He willed of that He has created. Glory be to Him! He is God, the One, the Omnipotent.

verses.content: خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ اللَّيْلَ عَلَى النَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ النَّهَارَ عَلَى اللَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
verses.translation: He created the heavens and the earth in truth, wrapping night about the day, and wrapping the day about the night; and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each of them running to a stated term. Is not He the All-mighty, the All-forgiving?

verses.content: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَاحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الْأَنْعَامِ ثَمَانِيَةَ أَزْوَاجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّن بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِي ظُلُمَاتٍ ثَلَاثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۖ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
verses.translation: He created you of a single soul, then from it He appointed its mate; and He sent down to you of the cattle eight couples. He creates you in your mothers' wombs creation after creation in threefold shadows. That then is God, your Lord; to Him belongs the Kingdom; there is no god but He; so how are you turned about?

verses.content: إِن تَكْفُرُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ الْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: If you are unthankful, God is independent of you, yet He approves not unthankfulness in His servants; but if you are thankful, He will approve it in you. And no soul laden bears the load of another. Then to your Lord shall you return, and He will tell you what you have been doing. He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَسَّ الْإِنسَانَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُو إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ النَّارِ
verses.translation: When some affliction visits a man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to him; then when He confers on him a blessing from Him he forgets that he was calling to before and sets up compeers to God, to lead astray from His way. Say: 'Enjoy thy unbelief a little; thou shalt be among the inhabitants of the Fire.'

verses.content: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَانِتٌ آنَاءَ اللَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَائِمًا يَحْذَرُ الْآخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُو رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: Or is he who is obedient in the watches of the night, bowing himself and standing, he being afraid of the world to come and hoping for the mercy of his Lord..? Say: 'Are they equal -- those who know and those who know not?' Only men possessed of minds remember.

verses.content: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا فِي هَـٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ اللَّهِ وَاسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
