verses.translation: Surely those who lower their voices in the presence of God's Messenger, those are they whose hearts God has tested for godfearing; they shall have forgiveness and a mighty wage.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Surely those who call unto thee from behind the apartments, the most of them do not understand.

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: And if they had patience, until thou comest out to them, that would be better for them; and God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَن تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
verses.translation: O believers, if an ungodly man comes to you with a tiding, make clear, lest you afflict a people unwittingly, and then repent of what you have done.

verses.content: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
verses.translation: And know that the Messenger of God is among you. If he obeyed you in much of the affair, you would suffer; but God has endeared to you belief, decking it fair in your hearts, and He has made detestable to you unbelief and ungodliness and disobedience. Those -- they are the right-minded,

verses.content: فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: by God's favour and blessing; God is All-knowing, All-wise.

verses.content: وَإِن طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِن بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيءَ إِلَىٰ أَمْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.translation: If two parties of the believers fight, put things right between them; then, if one of them is insolent against the other, fight the insolent one till it reverts to God's commandment. If it reverts, set things right between them equitably, and be just. Surely God loves the just.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: The believers indeed are brothers; so set things right between your two brothers, and fear God; haply so you will find mercy.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِّن نِّسَاءٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ ۖ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.translation: O believers, let not any people scoff at another people who may be better than they; neither let women scoff at women who may be better than themselves. And find not fault with one another, neither revile one another by nicknames. An evil name is ungodliness after belief. And whoso repents not, those -- they are the evildoers.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O believers, eschew much suspicion; some suspicion is a sin. And do not spy, neither backbite one another; would any of you like to eat the flesh of his brother dead? You would abominate it. And fear you God; assuredly God turns, and He is All-compassionate.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: O mankind, We have created you male and female, and appointed you races and tribes, that you may know one another. Surely the noblest among you in the sight of God is the most godfearing of you. God is All-knowing, All-aware.

verses.content: قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: The Bedouins say, 'We believe.' Say: 'You do not believe; rather say, "We surrender"; for belief has not yet entered your hearts. If you obey God and His Messenger, He will not diminish you anything of your works. God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.'

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
verses.translation: The believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger, then have not doubted, and have struggled with their possessions and their selves in the way of God; those -- they are the truthful ones.

verses.content: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: 'What, would you teach God what your religion is, and God knows what is in the heavens and what is in the earth? And God has knowledge of everything.'

verses.content: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُم ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: They count it as a favour to thee that they have surrendered! Say: 'Do not count your surrendering as a favour to me; nay, but rather God confers a favour upon you, in that He has guided you to belief, if it be that you are truthful.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: God knows the Unseen of the heavens and of the earth; and God sees the things you do.'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qaf. By the glorious Koran!

verses.content: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: Nay, but they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, 'This is a marvellous thing!

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: What, when we are dead and become dust? That is a far returning!'

verses.content: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.translation: We know what the earth diminishes of them; with Us is a book recording.

verses.content: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: Nay, but they cried lies to the truth when it came to them, and so they are in a case confused.

verses.content: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: What, have they not beheld heaven above them, how We have built it, and decked it out fair, and it has no cracks?

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And the earth -- We stretched it forth, and cast on it firm mountains, and We caused to grow therein of every joyous kind

verses.content: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: for an insight and a reminder to every penitent servant.

verses.content: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We sent down out of heaven water blessed, and caused to grow thereby gardens and grain of harvest

verses.content: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: and tall palm-trees with spathes compact,

verses.content: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: a provision for the servants, and thereby We revived a land that was dead. Even so is the coming forth.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: Cried lies before them the people of Noah and the men of Er-Rass, and Thamood,

verses.content: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: and Ad and Pharaoh, the brothers of Lot,

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: the men of the Thicket, the people of Tubba'. Every one cried lies to the Messengers, and My threat came true.

verses.content: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: What, were We wearied by the first creation? No indeed; but they are in uncertainty as to the new creation.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: We indeed created man; and We know what his soul whispers within him, and We are nearer to him than the jugular vein.

verses.content: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When the two angels meet together, sitting one on the right, and one on the left,

verses.content: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: not a word he utters, but by him is an observer ready.

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And death's agony comes in truth; that is what thou wast shunning!

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Trumpet shall be blown; that is the Day of the Threat.

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And every soul shall come, and with it a driver and a witness.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: 'Thou wast heedless of this; therefore We have now removed from thee thy covering, and so thy sight today is piercing.'

verses.content: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his comrade shall say, 'This is what I have, made ready.'

verses.content: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: 'Cast, you twain, into Gehenna every froward unbeliever,

verses.content: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: every hinderer of the good, transgressor, disquieter,

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: who set up with God another god; therefore, you twain, cast him into the terrible chastisement.'

verses.content: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And his comrade shall say, 'Our Lord, I made him not insolent, but he was in far error.'

verses.content: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: He shall say, 'Dispute not before Me! For I sent you beforehand -- the threat.

verses.content: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: The Word is not changed with Me; I wrong not My servants.'

verses.content: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: Upon the day We shall say unto Gehenna, 'Art thou filled?' And it shall say, 'Are there any more to come?'

verses.content: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And Paradise shall be brought forward to the godfearing, not afar:

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: 'This is that you were promised; it is for every mindful penitent.'

verses.content: مَّنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Whosoever fears the All-merciful in the Unseen, and comes with a penitent heart:

verses.content: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: 'Enter it in peace! This is the Day of Eternity.'

verses.content: لَهُم مَّا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: Therein they shall have whatever they will; and with Us there is yet more.

verses.content: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: How many a generation We destroyed before them that was stronger in valour than they, then they searched about in the land; was there any asylum?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Surely in that there is a reminder to him who has a heart, or will give ear with a present mind.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: We created the heavens and the earth, and what between them is, in six days, and no weariness touched Us.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: So be thou patient under what they say, and proclaim thy Lord's praise before the rising of the sun, and before its setting,

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.translation: and proclaim thy Lord's praise in the night, and at the ends of the prostrations.

verses.content: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen thou for the day when the caller shall call from a near place.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: On the day they hear the Cry in truth, that is the day of coming forth.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: It is We who give life, and make to die, and to Us is the homecoming.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: Upon the day when the earth is split asunder from about them as they hasten forth; that is a mustering easy for Us.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We know very well what they say; thou art not a tyrant over them. Therefore remind by the Koran him who fears My threat.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By the swift scatterers

verses.content: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: and the burden-bearers

verses.content: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: and the smooth runners

verses.content: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: and the partitioners,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: surely that you are promised is true,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: and surely the Doom is about to fall!

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By heaven with all its tracks

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: surely you speak at variance,

verses.content: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: and perverted therefrom are some.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
verses.translation: Perish the conjecturers

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: who are dazed in perplexity

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: asking, 'When shall be the Day of Doom?'

verses.content: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: Upon the day when they shall be tried at the Fire:

verses.content: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: 'Taste your trial! This is that you were seeking to hasten.'

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Surely the godfearing shall be among gardens and fountains

verses.content: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: taking whatsoever their Lord has given them; they were good-doers before that.

verses.content: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: Little of the night would they slumber,

verses.content: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: and in the mornings they would ask for forgiveness;

verses.content: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: and the beggar and the outcast had a share in their wealth.

verses.content: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: In the earth are signs for those having sure faith;

verses.content: وَفِي أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and in your selves; what, do you not see?

verses.content: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in heaven is your provision, and that you are promised.

verses.content: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: So by the Lord of heaven and earth, it is as surely true as that you have speech.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Hast thou received the story of the honoured guests of Abraham?

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they entered unto him, saying 'Peace!' he said 'Peace! You are a people unknown to me.'

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf,

verses.content: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: and he laid it before them saying, 'Will you not eat?'

verses.content: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then he conceived a fear of them. They said, 'Be not afraid!' And they gave him good tidings of a cunning boy.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: Then came forward his wife, clamouring, and she smote her face, and said, 'An old woman, barren!'

verses.content: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, 'So says thy Lord; He is the All-wise, the All-knowing.'

verses.content: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Said he, 'And what is your business, envoys?'

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, 'We have been sent to a people of sinners,

verses.content: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: to loose upon them stones of clay

verses.content: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: marked with thy Lord for the prodigal.

verses.content: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So We brought forth such believers as were in it,

verses.content: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: but We found not therein except one house of those that have surrendered themselves.

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And therein We left a sign to those who fear the painful chastisement.

verses.content: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And also in Moses, when We sent him unto Pharaoh, with a clear authority,

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: but he turned his back, with his court, saying, 'A sorcerer, or a man possessed!'

verses.content: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We seized him and his hosts, and We cast them into the sea, and he blameworthy.

verses.content: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And also in Ad, when We loosed against them the withering wind

verses.content: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: that left nothing it came upon, but made it as stuff decayed.

verses.content: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And also in Thamood, when it was said to them, 'Take your enjoyment for a while!'

verses.content: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: Then they turned in disdain from the commandment of their Lord, and the thunderbolt took them and they themselves beholding

verses.content: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: and they were not able to stand upright, and were not helped.

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And the people of Noah before; surely they were an ungodly people.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: And heaven -- We built it with might, and We extend it wide.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And the earth -- We spread it forth; O excellent Smoothers!

verses.content: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of everything created We two kinds; haply you will remember.

verses.content: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Therefore flee unto God! I am a clear warner from Him to you.

verses.content: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And set not up with God another god; I am a clear warner from Him to you.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Even so not a Messenger came to those before them but they said, 'A sorcerer, or a man possessed!'

verses.content: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: What, have they bequeathed it one to another? Nay, but they are an insolent people.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: So turn thou from them; thou wilt not be reproached.

verses.content: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And remind; the Reminder profits the believers.

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: I have not created jinn and mankind except to serve Me.

verses.content: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I desire of them no provision, neither do I desire that they should feed Me.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Surely God is the All-provider, the Possessor of Strength, the Ever-Sure.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: The evildoers shall have their portion, like the portion of their fellows; so let them not hasten Me!

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So woe to the unbelievers, for that day of theirs that they are promised.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the Mount

verses.content: وَكِتَابٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: and a Book inscribed

verses.content: فِي رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: in a parchment unrolled,

verses.content: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: by the House inhabited

verses.content: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: and the roof uplifted

verses.content: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: and the sea swarming,

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: surely thy Lord's chastisement is about to fall;

verses.content: مَّا لَهُ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: there is none to avert it.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: Upon the day when heaven spins dizzily

verses.content: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: and the mountains are in motion,

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: woe that day unto those that cry lies,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: such as play at plunging,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: the day when they shall be pitched into the fire of Gehenna:

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: 'This is the fire that you cried lies to!

verses.content: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَا أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: What, is this magic, or is it you that do not see?

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Roast in it! And bear you patiently, or bear not patiently, equal it is to you; you are only being recompensed for that you were working.'

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Surely the godfearing shall be in gardens and bliss,

verses.content: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: rejoicing in that their Lord has given them; and their Lord shall guard them against the chastisement of Hell.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: 'Eat and drink, with wholesome appetite, for that you were working.

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: Reclining upon couches ranged in rows; and We shall espouse them to wide-eyed houris.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: And those who believed, and their seed followed them in belief, We shall join their seed with them, and We shall not defraud them of aught of their work; every man shall be pledged for what he earned.

verses.content: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُم بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We shall succour them with fruits and flesh such as they desire

verses.content: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: while they pass therein a cup one to another wherein is no idle talk, no cause of sin,

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: and there go round them youths, their own, as if they were hidden pearls.

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They say, 'We were before among our people, ever going in fear,

verses.content: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
verses.translation: and God was gracious to us, and guarded us against the chastisement of the burning wind;

verses.content: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: we were before ever calling upon Him; surely He is the All-benign, the All-compassionate.'

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Therefore remind! by thy Lord's blessing thou art not a soothsayer neither possessed.

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say, 'He is a poet for whom we await Fate's uncertainty'?

verses.content: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say: 'Await! I shall be awaiting with you.'

verses.content: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُم بِهَـٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Or do their intellects bid them do this? Or are they an insolent people?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, 'He has invented it?' Nay, but they do not believe.

verses.content: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِ إِن كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then let them bring a discourse like it, if they speak truly.

verses.content: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and earth? Nay, but they have not sure faith.

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or are thy Lord's treasuries in their keeping? Or are they the registrars?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a ladder whereon they listen? Then let any of them that has listened bring a clear authority.

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He daughters, and they sons?

verses.content: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or askest thou them for a wage, and so they are weighed down with debt?

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or is the Unseen in their keeping, and so they are writing it down?

verses.content: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or desire they to outwit? The unbelievers, they are the outwitted.

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a god, other than God? Glory be to God, above that which they associate!

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: Even if they saw lumps falling from heaven, they would say, 'A massed cloud!'

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: Then leave them, till they encounter their day wherein they shall be thunderstruck,

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: the day when their guile shall avail them naught, and they shall not be helped.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And there surely awaits the evildoers a chastisement beyond even that, but most of them know it not.

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be thou patient under the judgment of thy Lord; surely thou art before Our eyes. And proclaim the praise of thy Lord when thou arisest,

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: and proclaim the praise of thy Lord in the night, and at the declining of the stars.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: By the Star when it plunges,

verses.content: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.translation: your comrade is not astray, neither errs,

verses.content: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: nor speaks he out of caprice.

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ
verses.translation: This is naught but a revelation revealed,

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَىٰ
verses.translation: taught him by one terrible in power,

verses.content: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: very strong; he stood poised,

verses.content: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: being on the higher horizon,

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: then drew near and suspended hung,

verses.content: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
verses.translation: two bows' length away, or nearer,

verses.content: فَأَوْحَىٰ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَىٰ
verses.translation: then revealed to his servant that he revealed.

verses.content: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰ
verses.translation: His heart lies not of what he saw;

verses.content: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: what, will you dispute with him what he sees?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, he saw him another time

verses.content: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: by the Lote-Tree of the Boundary

verses.content: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: nigh which is the Garden of the Refuge,

verses.content: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: when there covered the Lote-Tree that which covered;

verses.content: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: his eye swerved not; nor swept astray.

verses.content: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, he saw one of the greatest signs of his Lord.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّىٰ
verses.translation: Have you considered El-Lat and El-'Uzza

verses.content: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and Manat the third, the other?

verses.content: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: What, have you males, and He females?

verses.content: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰ
verses.translation: That were indeed an unjust division.

verses.content: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُم مَّا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: They are naught but names yourselves have named, and your fathers; God has sent down no authority touching them. They follow only surmise, and what the souls desire; and yet guidance has come to them from their Lord.

verses.content: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.translation: Or shall man have whatever he fancies?

verses.content: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And to God belongs the First and the Last.

verses.content: وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: How many an angel there is in the heavens whose intercession avails not anything, save after that God gives leave to whomsoever He wills and is well-pleased.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who do not believe in the world to come name the angels with the names of females.

verses.content: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
verses.translation: They have not any knowledge thereof; they follow only surmise, and surmise avails naught against truth.

verses.content: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: So turn thou from him who turns away from Our Remembrance, and desires only the present life.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: That is their attainment of knowledge. Surely thy Lord knows very well those who have gone astray from His way, and He knows very well those who are guided.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
verses.translation: To God belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth, that He may recompense those who do evil for what they have done, and recompense those who have done good with the reward most fair.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who avoid the heinous sins and indecencies, save lesser offences surely thy Lord is wide in His forgiveness. Very well He knows you, when He produced you from the earth, and when you were yet unborn in your mothers' wombs; therefore hold not yourselves purified; God knows very well him who is godfearing.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou considered him who turns his back

verses.content: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
verses.translation: and gives a little, and then grudgingly?

verses.content: أَعِندَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he possess the knowledge of the Unseen, and therefore he sees?

verses.content: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Or has he not been told of what is in the scrolls of Moses,

verses.content: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
verses.translation: and Abraham, he who paid his debt in full?

verses.content: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: That no soul laden bears the load of another,

verses.content: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: and that a man shall have to his account only as he has laboured,

verses.content: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: and that his labouring shall surely be seen,

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.translation: then he shall be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense,

verses.content: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: and that the final end is unto thy Lord,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.translation: and that it is He who makes to laugh, and that makes to weep,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.translation: and that it is He who makes to die, and that makes to live,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and that He Himself created the two kinds, male and female,

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: of a sperm-drop, when it was cast forth,

verses.content: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and that upon Him rests the second growth,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and that it is He who gives wealth and riches,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: and that He destroyed Ad, the ancient,

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: and Thamood, and He did not spare them,

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: and the people of Noah before -- certainly they did exceeding evil, and were insolent

verses.content: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.translation: and the Subverted City He also overthrew,

verses.content: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: so that there covered it that which covered.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: Then which of thy Lord's bounties disputest thou?

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: This is a warner, of the warners of old.

verses.content: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
verses.translation: The Imminent is imminent;

verses.content: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: apart from God none can disclose it.

verses.content: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.translation: Do you then marvel at this discourse,

verses.content: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.translation: and do you laugh, and do you not weep,

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: while you make merry?

verses.content: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
verses.translation: So bow yourselves before God, and serve Him!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour has drawn nigh: the moon is split.

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: Yet if they see a sign they turn away, and they say 'A continuous sorcery!'

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: They have cried lies, and followed their caprices; but every matter is settled.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: And there have come to them such tidings as contain a deterrent --

verses.content: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: a Wisdom far-reaching; yet warnings do not avail.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: So turn thou away from them. Upon the day when the Caller shall call unto a horrible thing,

verses.content: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: abasing their eyes, they shall come forth from the tombs as if they were scattered grasshoppers,

verses.content: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: running with outstretched necks to the Caller. The unbelievers shall say, 'This is a hard day!'

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah cried lies before them; they cried lies to Our servant, and said, 'A man possessed!' And he was rejected.

verses.content: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
verses.translation: And so he called unto his Lord, saying, 'I am vanquished; do Thou succour me!'

verses.content: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: Then We opened the gates of heaven unto water torrential,

verses.content: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: and made the earth to gush with fountains, and the waters met for a matter decreed.

verses.content: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: And We bore him upon a well-planked vessel well-caulked

verses.content: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: running before Our eyes-a recompense for him denied.

verses.content: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We left it for a sign. Is there any that will remember?

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: Now We have made the Koran easy for Remembrance. Is there any that will remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Ad cried lies. How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: We loosed against them a wind clamorous in a day of ill fortune continuous,

verses.content: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: plucking up men as if they were stumps of uprooted palm-trees.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: Now We have made the Koran easy for Remembrance. Is there any that will remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Thamood cried lies to the warnings

verses.content: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: and said, 'What, shall we follow a mortal, one out of ourselves? Then indeed we should be in error and insanity!

verses.content: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: Has the Reminder been cast upon him alone among us? Nay, rather he is an impudent liar.'

verses.content: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: 'They shall surely know tomorrow who is the impudent liar.

verses.content: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: They shall send the She-camel as a trial for them; so watch thou them and keep patience.

verses.content: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: And tell them that the water is to be divided between them, each drink for each in turn.

verses.content: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: Then they called their comrade, and he took in hand, and hamstrung her.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How then were My chastisement and My warnings?

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: We loosed against them one Cry, and they were as the wattles of a pen-builder.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: Now We have made the Koran easy for Remembrance. Is there any that will remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lot cried lies to the warnings.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: We loosed against them a squall of pebbles except the folk of Lot; We delivered them at the dawn --

verses.content: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: a blessing from Us; even so We recompense him who is thankful.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: He had warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warnings.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Even his guests they had solicited of him; so We obliterated their eyes, saying, 'Taste now My chastisement and My warnings!'

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: In the morning early there came upon them a settled chastisement:

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: 'Taste now My chastisement and My warnings!'

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: Now We have made the Koran easy for Remembrance. Is there any that will remember?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: The warnings came also to Pharaoh's folk.

verses.content: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: They cried lies to Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with the seizing of One mighty, omnipotent.

verses.content: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَـٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: What, are your unbelievers better than those? Or have you an immunity in the Scrolls?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Or do they say, 'We are a congregation that shall be succoured?'

verses.content: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: Certainly the host shall be routed, and turn their backs.

verses.content: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: Nay, but the Hour is their tryst, and the Hour is very calamitous and bitter.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: Surely the sinners are in error and insanity!

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: The day when they are dragged on their faces into the Fire: 'Taste now the touch of Sakar!'

verses.content: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: Surely We have created everything in measure.

verses.content: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: Our commandment is but one word, as the twinkling of an eye.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have destroyed the likes of you; is there any that will remember?

verses.content: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Every thing that they have done is in the Scrolls,

verses.content: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: and everything, great and small, is inscribed.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.translation: Surely the godfearing shall dwell amid gardens and a river

verses.content: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: in a sure abode, in the presence of a King Omnipotent.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ
verses.translation: The All-merciful

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
verses.translation: has taught the Koran.

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ
verses.translation: He created man

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
verses.translation: and He has taught him the Explanation.

verses.content: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.translation: The sun and the moon to a reckoning,

verses.content: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.translation: and the stars and the trees bow themselves;

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: and heaven -- He raised it up, and set the Balance.

verses.content: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: (Transgress not in the Balance,

verses.content: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: and weigh with justice, and skimp not in the Balance.)

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.translation: And earth -- He set it down for all beings,

verses.content: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
verses.translation: therein fruits, and palm-trees with sheaths,

verses.content: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
verses.translation: and grain in the blade, and fragrant herbs.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِن صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created man of a clay like the potter's,

verses.content: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: and He created the jinn of a smokeless fire.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.translation: Lord of the Two Easts, Lord of the Two Wests,

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He let forth the two seas that meet together,

verses.content: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.translation: between them a barrier they do not overpass.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا اللُّؤْلُؤُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: From them come forth the pearl and the coral.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: وَلَهُ الْجَوَارِ الْمُنشَآتُ فِي الْبَحْرِ كَالْأَعْلَامِ
verses.translation: His too are the ships that run, raised up in the sea like land-marks.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
verses.translation: All that dwells upon the earth is perishing,

verses.content: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: yet still abides the Face of thy Lord, majestic, splendid.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: يَسْأَلُهُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ
verses.translation: Whatsoever is in the heavens and the earth implore Him; every day He is upon some labour.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلَانِ
verses.translation: We shall surely attend to you at leisure, you weight and you weight!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: يَا مَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا مِنْ أَقْطَارِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ فَانفُذُوا ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَانٍ
verses.translation: O tribe of jinn and of men, if you are able to pass through the confines of heaven and earth, pass through them! You shall not pass through except with an authority.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: Against you shall be loosed a flame of fire, and molten brass; and you shall not be helped.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فَإِذَا انشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَالدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: And when heaven is split asunder, and turns crimson like red leather --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of our Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْأَلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: on that day none shall be questioned about his sin, neither man nor jinn.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِي وَالْأَقْدَامِ
verses.translation: The sinners shall be known by their mark, and they shall be seized by their forelocks and their feet.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: This is Gehenna, that sinners cried lies to;

verses.content: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ
verses.translation: they shall go round between it and between hot, boiling water.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: But such as fears the Station of his Lord, for them shall be two gardens --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: ذَوَاتَا أَفْنَانٍ
verses.translation: abounding in branches --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
verses.translation: therein two fountains of running water --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ
verses.translation: therein of every fruit two kinds --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍ بَطَائِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى الْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.translation: reclining upon couches lined with brocade, the fruits of the gardens nigh to gather --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: therein maidens restraining their glances, untouched before them by any man or jinn --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ الْيَاقُوتُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: lovely as rubies, beautiful as coral --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
verses.translation: Shall the recompense of goodness be other than goodness?

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: And besides these shall be two gardens --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: مُدْهَامَّتَانِ
verses.translation: green, green pastures --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.translation: therein two fountains of gushing water --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ
verses.translation: therein fruits, and palm-trees, and pomegranates --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَاتٌ حِسَانٌ
verses.translation: therein maidens good and comely --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: حُورٌ مَّقْصُورَاتٌ فِي الْخِيَامِ
verses.translation: houris, cloistered in cool pavilions --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: untouched before them by any man or jinn --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.translation: reclining upon green cushions and lovely druggets --

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?

verses.content: تَبَارَكَ اسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Blessed be the Name of thy Lord, majestic, splendid.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: When the Terror descends

verses.content: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.translation: (and none denies its descending)

verses.content: خَافِضَةٌ رَّافِعَةٌ
verses.translation: abasing, exalting,

verses.content: إِذَا رُجَّتِ الْأَرْضُ رَجًّا
verses.translation: when the earth shall be rocked

verses.content: وَبُسَّتِ الْجِبَالُ بَسًّا
verses.translation: and the mountains crumbled

verses.content: فَكَانَتْ هَبَاءً مُّنبَثًّا
verses.translation: and become a dust, scattered,

verses.content: وَكُنتُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ثَلَاثَةً
verses.translation: and you shall be three bands --

verses.content: فَأَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Companions of the Right (O Companions of the Right!)

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: Companions of the Left (O Companions of the Left!)

verses.content: وَالسَّابِقُونَ السَّابِقُونَ
verses.translation: and the Outstrippers: the Outstrippers

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: those are they brought nigh the Throne,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: in the Gardens of Delight

verses.content: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: (a throng of the ancients

verses.content: وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and how few of the later folk)

verses.content: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّوْضُونَةٍ
verses.translation: upon close-wrought couches

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.translation: reclining upon them, set face to face,

verses.content: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
verses.translation: immortal youths going round about them

verses.content: بِأَكْوَابٍ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: with goblets, and ewers, and a cup from a spring

verses.content: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ
verses.translation: (no brows throbbing, no intoxication)

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةٍ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: and such fruits as they shall choose,

verses.content: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and such flesh of fowl as they desire,

verses.content: وَحُورٌ عِينٌ
verses.translation: and wide-eyed houris

verses.content: كَأَمْثَالِ اللُّؤْلُؤِ الْمَكْنُونِ
verses.translation: as the likeness of hidden pearls,

verses.content: جَزَاءً بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: a recompense for that they laboured.

verses.content: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.translation: Therein they shall hear no idle talk, no cause of sin,

verses.content: إِلَّا قِيلًا سَلَامًا سَلَامًا
verses.translation: only the saying 'Peace, Peace!'

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: The Companions of the Right (O Companions of the Right!)

verses.content: فِي سِدْرٍ مَّخْضُودٍ
verses.translation: mid thornless lote-trees

verses.content: وَطَلْحٍ مَّنضُودٍ
verses.translation: and serried acacias,

verses.content: وَظِلٍّ مَّمْدُودٍ
verses.translation: and spreading shade

verses.content: وَمَاءٍ مَّسْكُوبٍ
verses.translation: and outpoured waters,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ
verses.translation: and fruits abounding

verses.content: لَّا مَقْطُوعَةٍ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: unfailing, unforbidden,

verses.content: وَفُرُشٍ مَّرْفُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: and upraised couches.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنشَأْنَاهُنَّ إِنشَاءً
verses.translation: Perfectly We formed them, perfect,

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا
verses.translation: and We made them spotless virgins,

verses.content: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: chastely amorous,

verses.content: لِّأَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: like of age for the Companions of the Right.

verses.content: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: A throng of the ancients

verses.content: وَثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and a throng of the later folk.

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ
verses.translation: The Companions of the Left (O Companions of the Left!)

verses.content: فِي سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: mid burning winds and boiling waters

verses.content: وَظِلٍّ مِّن يَحْمُومٍ
verses.translation: and the shadow of a smoking blaze

verses.content: لَّا بَارِدٍ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: neither cool, neither goodly;

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ
verses.translation: and before that they lived at ease,

verses.content: وَكَانُوا يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى الْحِنثِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: and persisted in the Great Sin,

verses.content: وَكَانُوا يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: ever saying, 'What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be raised up?

verses.content: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: What, and our fathers, the ancients?'

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّ الْأَوَّلِينَ وَالْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Say: 'The ancients, and the later folk

verses.content: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: shall be gathered to the appointed time of a known day.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا الضَّالُّونَ الْمُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then you erring ones, you that cried lies,

verses.content: لَآكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٍ مِّن زَقُّومٍ
verses.translation: you shall eat of a tree called Zakkoum,

verses.content: فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: and you shall fill therewith your bellies

verses.content: فَشَارِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: and drink on top of that boiling water

verses.content: فَشَارِبُونَ شُرْبَ الْهِيمِ
verses.translation: lapping it down like thirsty camels.'

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: This shall be their hospitality on the Day of Doom.

verses.content: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
verses.translation: We created you; therefore why will you not believe?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا تُمْنُونَ
verses.translation: Have you considered the seed you spill?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Do you yourselves create it, or are We the Creators?

verses.content: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ الْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: We have decreed among you Death; We shall not be outstripped;

verses.content: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَالَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِي مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: that We may exchange the likes of you, and make you to grow again in a fashion you know not.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: You have known the first growth; so why will you not remember?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا تَحْرُثُونَ
verses.translation: Have you considered the soil you till?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الزَّارِعُونَ
verses.translation: Do you yourselves sow it, or are We the Sowers?

verses.content: لَوْ نَشَاءُ لَجَعَلْنَاهُ حُطَامًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.translation: Did We will, We would make it broken orts, and you would remain bitterly jesting --

verses.content: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: 'We are debt-loaded;

verses.content: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.translation: nay, we have been robbed!'

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ الْمَاءَ الَّذِي تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.translation: Have you considered the water you drink?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ الْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنزِلُونَ
verses.translation: Did you send it down from the clouds, or did We send it?

verses.content: لَوْ نَشَاءُ جَعَلْنَاهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: Did We will, We would make it bitter; so why are you not thankful?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ النَّارَ الَّتِي تُورُونَ
verses.translation: Have you considered the fire you kindle?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَا أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنشِئُونَ
verses.translation: Did you make its timber to grow, or did We make it?

verses.content: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَاهَا تَذْكِرَةً وَمَتَاعًا لِّلْمُقْوِينَ
verses.translation: We Ourselves made it for a reminder, and a boon to the desert-dwellers.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَاقِعِ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the fallings of the stars

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَقَسَمٌ لَّوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: (and that is indeed a mighty oath, did you but know it)

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقُرْآنٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: it is surely a noble Koran

verses.content: فِي كِتَابٍ مَّكْنُونٍ
verses.translation: in a hidden Book

verses.content: لَّا يَمَسُّهُ إِلَّا الْمُطَهَّرُونَ
verses.translation: none but the purified shall touch,

verses.content: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: a sending down from the Lord of all Being.

verses.content: أَفَبِهَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَنتُم مُّدْهِنُونَ
verses.translation: What, do you hold this discourse in disdain,

verses.content: وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: and do you make it your living to cry lies?

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ الْحُلْقُومَ
verses.translation: Why, but when the soul leaps to the throat of the dying

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ حِينَئِذٍ تَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: and that hour you are watching

verses.content: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: (And We are nigher him than you, but you do not see Us)

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا إِن كُنتُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِينِينَ
verses.translation: why, if you are not at Our disposal,

verses.content: تَرْجِعُونَهَا إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: do you not bring back his soul, if you speak truly?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then, if he be of those brought nigh the Throne,

verses.content: فَرَوْحٌ وَرَيْحَانٌ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: there shall be repose and ease, and a Garden of Delight;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: and if he be a Companion of the Right:

verses.content: فَسَلَامٌ لَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: 'Peace be upon thee, Companion of the Right!'

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنَ الْمُكَذِّبِينَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: But if he be of them that cried lies, and went astray,

verses.content: فَنُزُلٌ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: there shall be a hospitality of boiling water

verses.content: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: and the roasting in Hell.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Surely this is the truth of certainty.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

verses.content: لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life, and He makes to die, and He is powerful over everything.

verses.content: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: He is the First and the Last, the Outward and the Inward; He has knowledge of everything.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: It is He that created the heavens and the earth in six days then seated Himself upon the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth, and what comes forth from it, -- what comes down from heaven, and what goes up unto it. He is with you wherever you are; and God sees the things you do.

verses.content: لَّهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
verses.translation: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and unto Him all matters are returned.

verses.content: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: He makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night. He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

verses.content: آمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَأَنفِقُوا مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Believe in God and His Messenger, and expend of that unto which He has made you successors. And those of you who believe and expend shall have a mighty wage.

verses.content: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ ۙ وَالرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِرَبِّكُمْ وَقَدْ أَخَذَ مِيثَاقَكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: How is it with you, that you believe not in God seeing that the Messenger is calling you to believe in your Lord, and He has taken compact with you, if you are believers?

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ آيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ لِّيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: It is He who sends down upon His servant signs, clear signs, that He may bring you forth from the shadows into the light. Surely God is to you All-gentle, All-compassionate.

verses.content: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَاثُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنْ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبْلِ الْفَتْحِ وَقَاتَلَ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً مِّنَ الَّذِينَ أَنفَقُوا مِن بَعْدُ وَقَاتَلُوا ۚ وَكُلًّا وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: How is it with you, that you expend not in the way of God, and to God belongs the inheritance of the heavens and the earth? Not equal is he among you who spent, and who fought before the victory; those are mightier in rank than they who spent and fought afterwards; and unto each God has promised the reward most fair; and God is aware of the things you do.

verses.content: مَّن ذَا الَّذِي يُقْرِضُ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضَاعِفَهُ لَهُ وَلَهُ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Who is he that will lend to God a good loan, and He will multiply it for him, and his shall be a generous wage?

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ يَسْعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَانِهِم بُشْرَاكُمُ الْيَوْمَ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: Upon the day when thou seest the believers, men and women, their light running before them, and on their right hands. 'Good tidings for you today! Gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein to dwell for ever; that is indeed the mighty triumph.'

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُولُ الْمُنَافِقُونَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتُ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا انظُرُونَا نَقْتَبِسْ مِن نُّورِكُمْ قِيلَ ارْجِعُوا وَرَاءَكُمْ فَالْتَمِسُوا نُورًا فَضُرِبَ بَيْنَهُم بِسُورٍ لَّهُ بَابٌ بَاطِنُهُ فِيهِ الرَّحْمَةُ وَظَاهِرُهُ مِن قِبَلِهِ الْعَذَابُ
verses.translation: Upon the day when the hypocrites, men and women, shall say to those who have believed, 'Wait for us, so that we may borrow your light!' It shall be said, 'Return you back behind, and seek for a light!' And a wall shall be set up between them, having a door in the inward whereof is mercy, and against the outward thereof is chastisement.

verses.content: يُنَادُونَهُمْ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمْ فَتَنتُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ وَارْتَبْتُمْ وَغَرَّتْكُمُ الْأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَاءَ أَمْرُ اللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
verses.translation: They shall be calling unto them, 'Were we not with you?' They shall say, 'Yes indeed; but you tempted yourselves, and you awaited, and you were in doubt, and fancies deluded you, until God's commandment came, and the Deluder deluded you concerning God.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنكُمْ فِدْيَةٌ وَلَا مِنَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ مَأْوَاكُمُ النَّارُ ۖ هِيَ مَوْلَاكُمْ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Therefore today no ransom shall be taken from you, neither from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire, that is your master -- an evil homecoming!'

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا كَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Is it not time that the hearts of those who believe should be humbled to the Remembrance of God and the Truth which He has sent down, and that they should not be as those to whom the Book was given aforetime, and the term seemed over long to them, so that their hearts have become hard, and many of them are ungodly?

verses.content: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُحْيِي الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Know that God revives the earth after it was dead. We have indeed made clear for you the signs, that haply you will understand.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَالْمُصَّدِّقَاتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَاعَفُ لَهُمْ وَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Surely those, the men and the women, who make freewill offerings and have lent to God a good loan, it shall be multiplied for them, and theirs shall be a generous wage.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصِّدِّيقُونَ ۖ وَالشُّهَدَاءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ وَنُورُهُمْ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: And those who believe in God and His Messengers -- they are the just men and the martyrs in their Lord's sight; they have their wage, and their light. But the unbelievers, who have cried lies to Our signs, they are the inhabitants of Hell.

verses.content: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ وَزِينَةٌ وَتَفَاخُرٌ بَيْنَكُمْ وَتَكَاثُرٌ فِي الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَوْلَادِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيْثٍ أَعْجَبَ الْكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَاهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَامًا ۖ وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانٌ ۚ وَمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا مَتَاعُ الْغُرُورِ
verses.translation: Know that the present life is but a sport and a diversion, an adornment and a cause for boasting among you, and a rivalry in wealth and children.
