verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: in a lofty Garden,

verses.content: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
verses.translation: its clusters nigh to gather.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِي الْأَيَّامِ الْخَالِيَةِ
verses.translation: 'Eat and drink with wholesome appetite for that you did long ago, in the days gone by.'

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِشِمَالِهِ فَيَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: But as for him who is given his book in his left hand, he shall say, 'Would that I had not been given my book

verses.content: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: and not known my reckoning!

verses.content: يَا لَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ الْقَاضِيَةَ
verses.translation: Would it had been the end!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّي مَالِيَهْ ۜ
verses.translation: My wealth has not availed me,

verses.content: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلْطَانِيَهْ
verses.translation: my authority is gone from me.'

verses.content: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
verses.translation: 'Take him, and fetter him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ الْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
verses.translation: and then roast him in Hell,

verses.content: ثُمَّ فِي سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَاسْلُكُوهُ
verses.translation: then in a chain of seventy cubits' length insert him!

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Behold, he never believed in God the All-mighty,

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and he never urged the feeding of the needy;

verses.content: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ الْيَوْمَ هَاهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: therefore he today has not here one loyal friend,

verses.content: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
verses.translation: neither any food saving foul pus,

verses.content: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُ إِلَّا الْخَاطِئُونَ
verses.translation: that none excepting the sinners eat.'

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: No! I swear by that you see

verses.content: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and by that you do not see,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: it is the speech of a noble Messenger.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: It is not the speech of a poet (little do you believe)

verses.content: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: nor the speech of a soothsayer (little do you remember).

verses.content: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: A sending down from the Lord of all Being.

verses.content: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ الْأَقَاوِيلِ
verses.translation: Had he invented against Us any sayings,

verses.content: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: We would have seized him by the right hand,

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ الْوَتِينَ
verses.translation: then We would surely have cut his life-vein

verses.content: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَاجِزِينَ
verses.translation: and not one of you could have defended him.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: Surely it is a Reminder to the godfearing;

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: but We know that some of you will cry lies.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: Surely it is a sorrow to the unbelievers;

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: yet indeed it is the truth of certainty.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَأَلَ سَائِلٌ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
verses.translation: A questioner asked of a chastisement about to fall

verses.content: لِّلْكَافِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُ دَافِعٌ
verses.translation: for the unbelievers, which none may avert,

verses.content: مِّنَ اللَّهِ ذِي الْمَعَارِجِ
verses.translation: from God, the Lord of the Stairways.

verses.content: تَعْرُجُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِي يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.translation: To Him the angels and the Spirit mount up, in a day whereof the measure is fifty thousand years.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: So be thou patient with a sweet patience;

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُ بَعِيدًا
verses.translation: behold, they see it as if far off;

verses.content: وَنَرَاهُ قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: but We see it is nigh.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ السَّمَاءُ كَالْمُهْلِ
verses.translation: Upon the day when heaven shall be as molten copper

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ
verses.translation: and the mountains shall be as plucked wool-tufts,

verses.content: وَلَا يَسْأَلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
verses.translation: no loyal friend shall question loyal friend,

verses.content: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ الْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِي مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: as they are given sight of them. The sinner will wish that he might ransom himself from the chastisement of that day even by his sons,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَأَخِيهِ
verses.translation: his companion wife, his brother,

verses.content: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ الَّتِي تُؤْوِيهِ
verses.translation: his kin who sheltered him,

verses.content: وَمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.translation: and whosoever is in the earth, all together, so that then it might deliver him.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
verses.translation: Nay, verily it is a furnace

verses.content: نَزَّاعَةً لِّلشَّوَىٰ
verses.translation: snatching away the scalp,

verses.content: تَدْعُو مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: calling him who drew back and turned away,

verses.content: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰ
verses.translation: who amassed and hoarded.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.translation: Surely man was created fretful,

verses.content: إِذَا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
verses.translation: when evil visits him, impatient,

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ الْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
verses.translation: when good visits him, grudging,

verses.content: إِلَّا الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: save those that pray

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَائِمُونَ
verses.translation: and continue at their prayers,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ فِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: those in whose wealth is a right known

verses.content: لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: for the beggar and the outcast,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: who confirm the Day of Doom

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: and go in fear of the chastisement of their Lord

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
verses.translation: (from their Lord's chastisement none feels secure)

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: and guard their private parts

verses.content: إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: save from their wives and what their right hands own, then not being blameworthy

verses.content: فَمَنِ ابْتَغَىٰ وَرَاءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: (but whoso seeks after more than that, they are the transgressors),

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَانَاتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَاعُونَ
verses.translation: and who preserve their trusts and their covenant,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَادَاتِهِمْ قَائِمُونَ
verses.translation: and perform their witnessings,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: and who observe their prayers.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: Those shall be in Gardens, high-honoured.

verses.content: فَمَالِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
verses.translation: What ails the unbelievers, running with outstretched necks

verses.content: عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
verses.translation: towards thee on the right hand and on the left hand in knots?

verses.content: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: What, is every man of them eager to be admitted to a Garden of Bliss?

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Not so; for We have created them of what they know.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the Lord of the Easts and Wests, surely We are able

verses.content: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: to substitute a better than they; We shall not be outstripped.

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا وَيَلْعَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Then leave them alone to plunge and play until they encounter that day of theirs which they are promised,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: the day they shall come forth from the tombs hastily, as if they were hurrying unto a waymark,

verses.content: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: humbled their eyes, overspreading them abasement. That is the day which they were promised.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: We sent Noah to his people, saying, 'Warn thy people, ere there come on them a painful chastisement.'

verses.content: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said, 'O my people, I am unto you a clear warner,

verses.content: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: saying, "Serve God, and fear Him, and obey you me,

verses.content: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: and He will forgive you your sins, and defer you to a stated term; God's term, when it comes, cannot be deferred, did you but know."'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.translation: He said; 'My Lord, I have called my people by night and by day,

verses.content: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.translation: but my calling has only increased them in flight.

verses.content: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.translation: And whenever I called them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, and wrapped them in their garments, and persisted, and waxed very proud.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.translation: Then indeed I called them openly;

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.translation: then indeed I spoke publicly unto them, and I spoke unto them secretly,

verses.content: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: and I said, "Ask you forgiveness of your Lord; surely He is ever All-forgiving,

verses.content: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.translation: and He will loose heaven upon you in torrents

verses.content: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
verses.translation: and will succour you with wealth and sons, and will appoint for you gardens, and will appoint for you rivers.

verses.content: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.translation: What ails you, that you look not for majesty in God,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: seeing He created you by stages?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.translation: Have you not regarded how God created seven heavens one upon another,

verses.content: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.translation: and set the moon therein for a light and the sun for a lamp?

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَنبَتَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.translation: And God caused you to grow out of the earth,

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.translation: then He shall return you into it, and bring you forth.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.translation: And God has laid the earth for you as a carpet,

verses.content: لِّتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.translation: that thereof you may thread ways, ravines."

verses.content: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: Noah said, 'My Lord, they have rebelled against me, and followed him whose wealth and children increase him only in loss,

verses.content: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.translation: and have devised a mighty device

verses.content: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.translation: and have said, "Do not leave your gods, and do not leave Wadd, nor Suwa', Yaghuth, Ya'uq, neither Nasr."

verses.content: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
verses.translation: And they have led many astray. Increase Thou not the evildoers save in error!'

verses.content: مِّمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.translation: And because of their transgressions they were drowned, and admitted into a Fire, for they found not, apart from God, any to help them.

verses.content: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: And Noah said, 'My Lord, leave not upon the earth of the unbelievers even one.

verses.content: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.translation: Surely, if Thou leavest them, they will lead Thy servants astray, and will beget none but unbelieving libertines.

verses.content: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
verses.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whosoever enters my house as a believer, and the believers, men and women alike; and do Thou not increase the evildoers save in ruin!'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا
verses.translation: Say: 'It has been revealed to me that a company of the jinn gave ear, then they said, "We have indeed heard a Koran wonderful,

verses.content: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا
verses.translation: guiding to rectitude. We believe in it, and we will not associate with our Lord anyone.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.translation: He -- exalted be our Lord's majesty! has not taken to Himself either consort or a son.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.translation: The fool among us spoke against God outrage,

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن تَقُولَ الْإِنسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.translation: and we had thought that men and jinn would never speak against God a lie.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ الْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.translation: But there were certain men of mankind who would take refuge with certain men of the jinn, and they increased them in vileness,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: and they thought, even as you also thought, that God would never raise up anyone.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.translation: And we stretched towards heaven, but we found it filled with terrible guards and meteors.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
verses.translation: We would sit there on seats to hear; but any listening now finds a meteor in wait for him.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.translation: And so we know not whether evil is intended for those in the earth, or whether their Lord intends for them rectitude.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.translation: And some of us are the righteous, and some of us are otherwise; we are sects differing.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
verses.translation: Indeed, we thought that we should never be able to frustrate God in the earth, neither be able to frustrate Him by flight.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِن بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.translation: When we heard the guidance, we believed in it; and whosoever believes in his Lord, he shall fear neither paltriness nor vileness.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: And some of us have surrendered, and some of us have deviated. Those who have surrendered sought rectitude;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.translation: but as for those who have deviated, they have become firewood for Gehenna!"'

verses.content: وَأَن لَّوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُم مَّاءً غَدَقًا
verses.translation: Would they but go straight on the way, We would give them to drink of water copious,

verses.content: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.translation: that We might try them therein. And whosoever turns away from the Remembrance of his Lord, He will thrust him into chastisement rigorous.

verses.content: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: The places of worship belong to God; so call not, along with God, upon anyone.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.translation: When the servant of God stood calling on Him, they were wellnigh upon him in swarms.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'I call only upon my Lord, and I do not associate with Him anyone.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'Surely I possess no power over you, either for hurt or for rectitude.'

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'From God shall protect me not anyone, and I shall find, apart from Him, no refuge,

verses.content: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
verses.translation: excepting a Deliverance from God and His Messages. And whoso rebels against God and His messenger, for him there awaits the Fire of Gehenna; therein they shall dwell forever.'

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: Until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and fewer in numbers.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'I do not know whether that which you are promised is nigh, or whether my Lord will appoint for it a space;

verses.content: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Knower He of the Unseen, and He discloses not His Unseen to anyone,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِن بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
verses.translation: save only to such a Messenger as He is well-pleased with; then He despatches before him and behind him watchers,

verses.content: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: that He may know they have delivered the Messages of their Lord; and He encompasses all that is with them, and He has numbered everything in numbers.'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O thou enwrapped in thy robes,

verses.content: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: keep vigil the night, except a little

verses.content: نِّصْفَهُ أَوِ انقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: (a half of it, or diminish a little,

verses.content: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: or add a little), and chant the Koran very distinctly;

verses.content: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Behold, We shall cast upon thee a weighty word;

verses.content: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: surely the first part of the night is heavier in tread, more upright in speech,

verses.content: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: surely in the day thou hast long business.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the Name of thy Lord, and devote thyself unto Him very devoutly.

verses.content: رَّبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: Lord of the East and the West; there is no god but He; so take Him for a Guardian.

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: And bear thou patiently what they say, and forsake them graciously.

verses.content: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Leave Me to those who cry lies, those prosperous ones, and respite them a little,

verses.content: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: for with Us there are fetters, and a furnace,

verses.content: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: and food that chokes, and a painful chastisement,

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: upon the day when the earth and the mountains shall quake and the mountains become a slipping heap of sand.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Surely We have sent unto you a Messenger as a witness over you, even as We sent to Pharaoh a Messenger,

verses.content: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: but Pharaoh rebelled against the Messenger, so We seized him remorselessly.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: If therefore you disbelieve, how will you guard yourselves against a day that shall make the children grey-headed?

verses.content: السَّمَاءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: Whereby heaven shall be split, and its promise shall be performed.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Surely this is a Reminder; so let him who will take unto his Lord a way.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Thy Lord knows that thou keepest vigil nearly two-thirds of the night, or a half of it, or a third of it, and a party of those with thee; and God determines the night and the day. He knows that you will not number it, and He has turned towards you. Therefore recite of the Koran so much as is feasible. He knows that some of you are sick, and others journeying in the land, seeking the bounty of God, and others fighting in the way of God. So recite of it so much as is feasible. And perform the prayer, and pay the alms, and lend to God a good loan. Whatever good you shall forward to your souls' account, you shall find it with God as better, and mightier a wage. And ask God's forgiveness; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O thou shrouded in thy mantle,

verses.content: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: arise, and warn!

verses.content: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: Thy Lord magnify

verses.content: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: thy robes purify

verses.content: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.translation: and defilement flee!

verses.content: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: Give not, thinking to gain greater

verses.content: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.translation: and be patient unto thy Lord.

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: For when the Trump is sounded

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: that day will be a harsh day,

verses.content: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: for the unbelievers not easy.

verses.content: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: Leave Me with him whom I created alone,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: and appointed for him ample wealth

verses.content: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: and sons standing before him,

verses.content: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: and made all things smooth for him;

verses.content: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: then he is eager that I should do more.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: Nay! He is forward unto Our signs;

verses.content: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: and I shall constrain him to a hard ascent.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Lo! He reflected, and determined --

verses.content: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: death seize him, how he determined!

verses.content: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Again, death seize him, how he determined!

verses.content: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then he beheld,

verses.content: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: then he frowned, and scowled,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: then he retreated, and waxed proud.

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: He said, 'This is naught but a trumped-up sorcery;

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: 'this is nothing but mortal speech.'

verses.content: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I shall surely roast him in Sakar;

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: and what will teach thee what is Sakar?

verses.content: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It spares not, neither leaves alone

verses.content: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: scorching the flesh;

verses.content: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: over it are nineteen.

verses.content: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: We have appointed only angels to be masters of the Fire, and their number We have appointed only as a trial for the unbelievers, that those who were given the Book may have certainty, and that those who believe may increase in belief, and that those who were given the Book and those who believe may not be in-doubt, and that those in whose hearts there is sickness, and the unbelievers, may say, 'What did God intend by this as a similitude?' So God leads astray whomsoever He will, and He guides whomsoever He will; and none knows the hosts of thy Lord but He. And it is naught but a Reminder to mortals.

verses.content: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: Nay! By the moon

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: and the night when it retreats

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: and the dawn when it is white,

verses.content: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: surely it is one of the greatest things

verses.content: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: as a warner to mortals.

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: to whoever of you desires to go forward or lag behind.

verses.content: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul shall be pledged for what it has earned,

verses.content: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: save the Companions of the Right;

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: in Gardens they will question

verses.content: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: concerning the sinners,

verses.content: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: 'What thrusted you into Sakar?'

verses.content: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They shall say, 'We were not of those who prayed, and

verses.content: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: we fed not the needy,

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.translation: and we plunged along with the plungers,

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: and we cried lies to the Day of Doom,

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: till the Certain came to us.' --

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: Then the intercession of the intercessors shall not profit them.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: What ails them, that they turn away from the Reminder,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: as if they were startled asses

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: fleeing -- before a lion?

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Nay, every man of them desires to be -- given -- scrolls unrolled.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but they do not fear the Hereafter.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: No indeed; surely it is a Reminder;

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: so whoever wills shall remember it.

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: And they will not remember, except that God wills; He is worthy to be feared, -- worthy to forgive.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the reproachful soul.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: What, does man reckon We shall not gather his bones?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: Yes indeed; We are able to shape again his fingers.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: Nay, but man desires to continue on as a libertine,

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: asking, 'When shall be the Day of Resurrection?'

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: But when the sight is dazed

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: and the moon is eclipsed,

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: and the sun and moon are brought together,

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: upon that day man shall say, 'Whither to flee?'

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: No indeed; not a refuge!

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: Upon that day the recourse shall be to thy Lord.

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: Upon that day man shall be told his former deeds and his latter;

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: nay, man shall be a clear proof against himself,

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: even though he offer his excuses.

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: Move not thy tongue with it to hasten it;

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: Ours it is to gather it, and to recite it.

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: So, when We recite it, follow thou its recitation.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: Then Ours it is to explain it.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but you love the hasty world,

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: and leave be the Hereafter.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Upon that day faces shall be radiant,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: gazing upon their Lord;

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: and upon that day faces shall be scowling,

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: thou mightest think the Calamity has been wreaked on them.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: No indeed; when it reaches the clavicles

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: and it is said, 'Who is an enchanter?'

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: and he thinks that it is the parting

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: and leg is intertwined with leg,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: upon that day unto thy Lord shall be the driving.

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: For he confirmed it not, and did not pray,

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: but he cried it lies, and he turned away,

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: then he went to his household arrogantly.

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Nearer to thee and nearer

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: then nearer to thee and nearer!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: What, does man reckon he shall be left to roam at will?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not a sperm-drop spilled?

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he was a blood-clot, and He created and formed,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and He made of him two kinds, male and female.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: What, is He not able to quicken the dead?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there come on man a while of time when he was a thing unremembered?

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: We created man of a sperm-drop, a mingling, and We made him hearing, seeing.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Surely We guided him upon the way whether he be thankful or unthankful.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Surely We have prepared for the unbelievers chains, fetters, and a Blaze.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Surely the pious shall drink of a cup whose mixture is camphor,

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: a fountain whereat drink the servants of God, making it to gush forth plenteously.

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They fulfil their vows, and fear a day whose evil is upon the wing;

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: they give food, for the love of Him, to the needy, the orphan, the captive:

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: 'We feed you only for the Face of God; we desire no recompense from you, no thankfulness;

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: for we fear from our Lord a frowning day, inauspicious.

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: So God has guarded them from the evil of that day, and has procured them radiancy and gladness,

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: and recompensed them for their patience with a Garden, and silk;

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: therein they shall recline upon couches, therein they shall see neither sun nor bitter cold;

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: near them shall be its shades, and its clusters hung meekly down,

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: and there shall be passed around them vessels of silver, and goblets of crystal,

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: crystal of silver that they have measured -- very exactly.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And therein they shall be given to drink a cup whose mixture is ginger,

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: therein a fountain whose name is called Salsabil.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: Immortal youths shall go about them; when thou seest them, thou supposest them scattered pearls,

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: when thou seest them then thou seest bliss and a great kingdom.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon them shall be green garments of silk and brocade; they are adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord shall give them to drink a pure draught.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: Behold, this is a recompense for you, and your striving is thanked.'

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Surely We have sent down the Koran on thee, a sending down;

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: so be thou patient under the judgment of thy Lord, and obey not one of them, sinner or unbeliever.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the Name of thy Lord at dawn and in the evening

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: and part of the night; bow down before Him and magnify Him through the long night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Surely these men love the hasty world, and leave be behind them a heavy day.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We created them, and We strengthened their joints; and, when We will, We shall exchange their likes.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Surely this is a Reminder; so he who will, takes unto his Lord a way.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: But you will not unless God wills; surely God is ever All-knowing, All-wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: For He admits into His mercy whomsoever He will; as for the evildoers, He has prepared for them a painful chastisement.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By the loosed ones successively

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: storming tempestuously

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: by the scatterers scattering

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: and the severally severing

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: and those hurling a reminder

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: excusing or warning,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: surely that which you are promised is about to fall!

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: When the stars shall be extinguished,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: when heaven shall be split

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: when the mountains shall be scattered

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: and when the Messengers' time is set,

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: to what day shall they be delayed?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: To the Day of Decision.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what shall teach thee what is the Day of Decision?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the ancients,

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and then follow them with the later folk?

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: So We serve the sinners.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you of a mean water,

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: that We laid within a sure lodging

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: till a known term decreed?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: We determined; excellent determiners are We.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Made We not the earth to be a housing

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: for the living and for the dead?

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: Set We not therein soaring mountains? Sated you with sweetest water?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Depart to that you cried was lies!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Depart to a triple-massing shadow

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: unshading against the blazing flame

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: that shoots sparks like dry faggots,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: sparks like to golden herds.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is the day they shall not speak

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: neither be given leave, and excuse themselves.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: 'This is the Day of Decision; We have joined you with the ancients;

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: if you have a trick, try you now to trick Me!'

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Truly the godfearing shall dwell amid shades and fountains,

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and such fruits as their hearts desire:

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: 'Eat and drink, with wholesome appetite, for that you were working.'

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Even so do We recompense the good-doers.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: 'Eat and take your joy a little; you are sinners!'

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: When it is said to them, 'Prostrate yourselves!' they prostrate not.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: In what discourse after this will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: Of what do they question one another?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Of the mighty tiding

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: whereon they are at variance.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed; they shall soon know!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again, no indeed; they shall soon know!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth as a cradle

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: and the mountains as pegs?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And We created you in pairs,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: and We appointed your sleep for a rest;

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: and We appointed night for a garment,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: and We appointed day for a livelihood.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And We have built above you seven strong ones,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: and We appointed a blazing lamp

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: and have sent down out of the rainclouds water cascading

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: that We may bring forth thereby grain and plants,

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: and gardens luxuriant.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: Surely the Day of Decision is an appointed time,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: the day the Trumpet is blown, and you shall come in troops,

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: and heaven is opened, and become gates,

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: and the mountains are set in motion, and become a vapour.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Behold, Gehenna has become an ambush,

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: for the insolent a resort,

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: therein to tarry for ages,

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: tasting therein neither coolness nor any drink

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: save boiling water and pus

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: for a suitable recompense.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: They indeed hoped not for a reckoning,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: and they cried loud lies to Our signs;

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: and everything We have numbered in a Book.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: 'Taste! We shall increase you not save in chastisement.'

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Surely for the godfearing awaits a place of security,

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: gardens and vineyards

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: and maidens with swelling breasts, like of age,

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: and a cup overflowing.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: Therein they shall hear no idle talk, no cry of lies,

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: for a recompense from thy Lord, a gift, a reckoning,

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and earth, and all that between them is, the All-merciful of whom they have no power to speak.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: Upon the day when the Spirit and the angels stand in ranks they shall speak not, save him to whom the All-merciful has given leave, and who speaks aright.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That is the true day; so whosoever wills takes unto his Lord a resort.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: Lo, We have warned you of a nigh chastisement, upon the day when a man shall behold what his hands have forwarded, and the unbeliever shall say, 'O would that I were dust!'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By those that pluck out vehemently

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: and those that draw out violently,

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: by those that swim serenely

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: and those that outstrip suddenly

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: by those that direct an affair!

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: Upon the day when the first blast shivers

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: and the second blast follows it,

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: hearts upon that day shall be athrob

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: and their eyes shall be humbled.

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They shall say, 'What, are we being restored as we were before?

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: What, when we are bones old and wasted?'

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They shall say, 'That then were a losing return!'

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: But it shall be only a single scare,

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: and behold, they are awakened.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Hast thou received the story of Moses?

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: When his Lord called to him in the holy valley, Towa:

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: 'Go to Pharaoh; he has waxed insolent.

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say, "Hast thou the will to purify thyself;

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and that I should guide thee to thy Lord, then thou shalt fear?"'

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So he showed him the great sign,

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: but he cried lies, and rebelled,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: then he turned away hastily,

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: then he mustered

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: and proclaimed, and he said, 'I am your Lord, the Most High!'

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: So God seized him with the chastisement of the Last World and the First.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely in that is a lesson for him who fears!

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: What, are you stronger in constitution or the heaven He built?

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: He lifted up its vault, and levelled it,

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: and darkened its night, and brought forth its forenoon;

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: and the earth-after that He spread it out,

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: therefrom brought forth its waters and its pastures,

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: and the mountains He set firm,

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: an enjoyment for you and your flocks.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Then, when the Great Catastrophe comes

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: upon the day when man shall remember what he has striven,

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: and Hell is advanced for whoever sees,

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: then as for him who was insolent

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: and preferred the present life,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: surely Hell shall be the refuge.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who feared the Station of his Lord and forbade the soul its caprice,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: surely Paradise shall be the refuge.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: They will question thee concerning the Hour, when it shall berth.

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: What art thou about, to mention it?

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: Unto thy Lord is the final end of it.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: Thou art only the warner of him who fears it.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: It shall be as if; on the day they see it, they have but tarried for an evening, or its forenoon.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: that the blind man came to him.

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And what should teach thee? Perchance he would cleanse him,

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: or yet remember, and the Reminder profit him.

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But the self-sufficient,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: to him thou attendest

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: though it is not thy concern, if he does not cleanse himself.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And he who comes to thee eagerly

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and fearfully,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: to him thou payest no heed.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: No indeed; it is a Reminder

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: (and whoso wills, shall remember it)

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: upon pages high-honoured,

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: uplifted, purified,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: by the hands of scribes

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: noble, pious.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: Perish Man! How unthankful he is!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: Of what did He create him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Of a sperm-drop He created him, and determined him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: then the way eased for him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: then makes him to die, and buries him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: then, when He wills, He raises him.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: No indeed! Man has not accomplished His bidding.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Let Man consider his nourishment.

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: We poured out the rains abundantly,

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: then We split the earth in fissures

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: and therein made the grains to grow

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: and vines, and reeds,

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: and olives, and palms,

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: and dense-tree'd gardens,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: and fruits, and pastures,

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: an enjoyment for you and your flocks.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: And when the Blast shall sound,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: upon the day when a man shall flee from his brother,

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: his mother, his father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: his consort, his sons,

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: every man that day shall have business to suffice him.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces on that day shall shine

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: laughing, joyous;

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: some faces on that day shall be dusty

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: o'erspread with darkness --

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: those -- they are the unbelievers, the libertines.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun shall be darkened,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: when the stars shall be thrown down,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when the mountains shall be set moving,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: when the pregnant camels shall be neglected,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: when the savage beasts shall be mustered,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when the seas shall be set boiling,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: when the souls shall be coupled,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: when the buried infant shall be asked

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: for what sin she was slain,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: when the scrolls shall be unrolled,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: when heaven shall be stripped off;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when Hell shall be set blazing,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: when Paradise shall be brought nigh,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: then shall a soul know what it has produced.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the slinkers,

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: the runners, the sinkers,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: by the night swarming,

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: by the dawn sighing,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: truly this is the word of a noble Messenger

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: having power, with the Lord of the Throne secure,

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: obeyed, moreover trusty.

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Your companion is not possessed;

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: he truly saw him on the clear horizon;

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: he is not niggardly of the Unseen.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: And it is not the word of an accursed Satan;

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: where then are you going?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is naught but a Reminder unto all beings,

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: for whosoever of you who would go straight;

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: but will you shall not, unless God wills, the Lord of all Being.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When heaven is split open,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: when the stars are scattered,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when the seas swarm over,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: when the tombs are overthrown,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: then a soul shall know its works, the former and the latter.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O Man! What deceived thee as to thy generous Lord

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: who created thee and shaped thee and wrought thee in symmetry

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: and composed thee after what form He would?

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: No indeed; but you cry lies to the Doom;

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: yet there are over you watchers

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: noble, writers

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: who know whatever you do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Surely the pious shall be in bliss,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: and the libertines shall be in a fiery furnace

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: roasting therein on the Day of Doom,

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: nor shall they ever be absent from it.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what shall teach thee what is the Day of Doom?

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again, what shall teach thee what is the Day of Doom?

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: A day when no soul shall possess aught to succour another soul; that day the Command shall belong unto God.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to the stinters who,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: when they measure against the people, take full measure

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: but, when they measure for them or weigh for them, do skimp.

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do those not think that they shall be raised up

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: unto a mighty day

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: a day when mankind shall stand before the Lord of all Being?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: No indeed; the Book of the libertines is in Sijjin;

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: and what shall teach thee what is Sijjin?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A book inscribed.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: who cry lies to the Day of Doom;

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: and none cries lies to it but every guilty aggressor.

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When our signs are recited to him, he says, 'Fairy-tales of the ancients!'

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but that they were earning has rusted upon their hearts.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but upon that day they shall be veiled from their Lord,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: then they shall roast in Hell.

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then it shall be said to them, 'This is that you cried lies to.'

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: No indeed; the book of the pious is in Illiyun;

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: and what shall teach thee what is Illiyun?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A book inscribed,

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: witnessed by those brought nigh.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Surely the pious shall be in bliss,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: upon couches gazing;

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: thou knowest in their faces the radiancy of bliss

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: as they are given to drink of a wine sealed

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: whose seal is musk -- so after that let the strivers strive --

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: and whose mixture is Tasnim,

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: a fountain at which do drink those brought nigh.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Behold, the sinners were laughing at the believers,

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: when them passed them by winking at one another,

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: and when they returned to their people they returned blithely,

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: and when they saw them they said, 'Lo, these men are astray!'

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Yet they were not sent as watchers over them.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: So today the believers are laughing at the unbelievers,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: upon couches gazing.

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have the unbelievers been rewarded what they were doing?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When heaven is rent asunder

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: and gives ear to its Lord, and is fitly disposed;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: when earth is stretched out

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: and casts forth what is in it, and voids itself,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: and gives ear to its Lord, and is fitly disposed!

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: O Man! Thou art labouring unto thy Lord laboriously, and thou shalt encounter Him.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: Then as for him who is given his book in his right hand,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: he shall surely receive an easy reckoning

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: and he will return to his family joyfully.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: But as for him who is given his book behind his back,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: he shall call for destruction

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: and he shall roast at a Blaze.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: He once lived among his family joyfully;

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: he surely thought he would never revert.

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the twilight

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: and the night and what it envelops

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: and the moon when it is at the full,

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: you shall surely ride stage after stage.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then what ails them, that they believe not,

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: and when the Koran is recited to them they do not bow?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but the unbelievers are crying lies,

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: and God knows very well what they are secreting.

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So give them good tidings of a painful chastisement,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: except those that believe, and do righteous deeds -- theirs shall be a wage unfailing.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By heaven of the constellations,

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: by the promised day,

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: by the witness and the witnessed,

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: slain were the Men of the Pit,

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: the fire abounding in fuel,

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: when they were seated over it

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: and were themselves witnesses of what they did with the believers.

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: They took revenge on them only because they believed in the All-mighty, the Al-laudable,

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: God to whom belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and God is Witness over everything.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Those who persecute the believers, men and women, and then have not repented, there awaits them the chastisement of Gehenna, and there awaits them the chastisement of the burning.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Those who believe, and do righteous deeds, for them await gardens underneath which rivers flow; that is the great triumph.

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Surely thy Lord's assault is terrible.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Surely it is He who originates, and brings again,

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: and He is the All-forgiving, the All-loving,

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Lord of the Throne, the All-glorious,

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Performer of what He desires.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Hast thou received the story of the hosts,

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: Pharaoh and Thamood?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: Nay, but the unbelievers still cry lies,

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: and God is behind them, encompassing.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: Nay, but it is a glorious Koran,

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: in a guarded tablet.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By heaven and the night-star!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And what shall teach thee what is the night-star?

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: The piercing star!

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: Over every soul there is a watcher.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So let man consider of what he was created;

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
