verses.translation: he was created of gushing water

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: issuing between the loins and the breast-bones.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Surely He is able to bring him back

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: upon the day when the secrets are tried,

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: and he shall have no strength, no helper.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By heaven of the returning rain,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: by earth splitting with verdure,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: surely it is a decisive word;

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: it is no merriment.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: They are devising guile,

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: and I am devising guile.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: So respite the unbelievers; delay with them awhile.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Magnify the Name of thy Lord the Most High

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: who created and shaped,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: who determined and guided,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: who brought forth the pasturage

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: then made it a blackening wrack.

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall make thee recite, to forget not

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: save what God wills; surely He knows what is spoken aloud and what is hidden.

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall ease thee unto the Easing.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Therefore remind, if the Reminder profits,

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and he who fears shall remember,

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: but the most wretched shall flout it,

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: even he who shall roast in the Great Fire,

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: then he shall neither die therein, nor live.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Prosperous is he who has cleansed himself,

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: and mentions the Name of his Lord, and prays.

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: Nay, but you prefer the present life;

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: and the world to come is better, and more enduring.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely this is in the ancient scrolls,

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: the scrolls of Abraham and Moses.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Hast thou received the story of the Enveloper?

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that day humbled,

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: labouring, toilworn,

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: roasting at a scorching fire,

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: watered at a boiling fountain,

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: no food for them but cactus thorn

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: unfattening, unappeasing hunger.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that day jocund,

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: with their striving well-pleased,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: in a sublime Garden,

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: hearing there no babble;

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: therein a running fountain,

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: therein uplifted couches

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: and goblets set forth

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: and cushions arrayed

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: and carpets outspread.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: What, do they not consider how the camel was created,

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: how heaven was lifted up,

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: how the mountains were hoisted,

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: how the earth was outstretched?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: Then remind them! Thou art only a reminder;

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: thou art not charged to oversee them.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: But he who turns his back, and disbelieves,

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: God shall chastise him with the greatest chastisement.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: Truly, to Us is their return;

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: then upon Us shall rest their reckoning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the dawn

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: and ten nights,

verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: by the even and the odd,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: by the night when it journeys on!

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Is there in that an oath for a mindful man?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Hast thou not seen how thy Lord did with Ad,

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: Iram of the pillars,

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: the like of which was never created in the land,

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: and Thamood, who hollowed the rocks in the valley,

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: and Pharaoh, he of the tent-pegs,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: who all were insolent in the land

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: and worked much corruption therein?

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Thy Lord unloosed on them a scourge of chastisement;

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: surely thy Lord is ever on the watch.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: As for man, whenever his Lord tries him, and honours him, and blesses him, then he says, 'My Lord has honoured me.'

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: But when he tries him and stints for him his provision, then he says, 'My Lord has despised me.'

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but you honour not the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and you urge not the feeding of the needy,

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: and you devour the inheritance greedily,

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: and you love wealth with an ardent love

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: No indeed! When the earth is ground to powder,

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: and thy Lord comes, and the angels rank on rank,

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and Gehenna is brought out, upon that day man will remember; and how shall the Reminder be for him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He shall say, 'O would that I had forwarded for my life!'

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Upon that day none shall chastise as He chastises,

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: none shall bind as He binds.

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: 'O soul at peace,

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: return unto thy Lord, well-pleased, well-pleasing!

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: Enter thou among My servants!

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: Enter thou My Paradise!'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by this land,

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: and thou art a lodger in this land;

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: by the begetter, and that he begot,

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: indeed, We created man in trouble.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: What, does he think none has power over him,

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: saying, 'I have consumed wealth abundant'?

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: What, does he think none has seen him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not appointed to him two eyes,

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: and a tongue, and two lips,

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: and guided him on the two highways?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: Yet he has not assaulted the steep;

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: and what shall teach thee what is the steep?

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: The freeing of a slave,

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: or giving food upon a day of hunger

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: to an orphan near of kin

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: or a needy man in misery;

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: then that he become of those who believe and counsel each other to be steadfast, and counsel each other to be merciful.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Those are the Companions of the Right Hand.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: And those who disbelieve in Our signs, they are the Companions of the Left Hand;

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: over them is a Fire covered down.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and his morning brightness

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: and by the moon when she follows him,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: and by the day when it displays him

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: and by the night when it enshrouds him!

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: By the heaven and That which built it

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: and by the earth and That which extended it!

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: By the soul, and That which shaped it

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: and inspired it to lewdness and godfearing!

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: Prosperous is he who purifies it,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: and failed has he who seduces it.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: Thamood cried lies in their insolence

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: when the most wretched of them uprose,

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: then the Messenger of God said to them, 'The She-camel of God; let her drink!'

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: But they cried him lies, and hamstrung her, so their Lord crushed them for their sin, and leveled them:

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: and He fears not the issue thereof.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night enshrouding

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: and the day in splendour

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and That which created the male and the female,

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: surely your striving is to diverse ends.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who gives and is godfearing

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and confirms the reward most fair,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall surely ease him to the Easing.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who is a miser, and self-sufficient,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and cries lies to the reward most fair,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall surely ease him to the Hardship;

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: his wealth shall not avail him when he perishes.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely upon Us rests the guidance,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: and to Us belong the Last and the First.

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: Now I have warned you of a Fire that flames,

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: whereat none but the most wretched shall be roasted,

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: even he who cried lies, and turned away;

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: and from which the most godfearing shall be removed,

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: even he who gives his wealth. to purify himself

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: and confers no favour on any man for recompense,

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: only seeking the Face of his Lord the Most High;

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: and he shall surely be satisfied.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the white forenoon

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: and the brooding night!

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Thy Lord has neither forsaken thee nor hates thee

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: and the Last shall be better for thee than the First.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: Thy Lord shall give thee, and thou shalt be satisfied.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find thee an orphan, and shelter thee?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find thee erring, and guide thee?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find thee needy, and suffice thee?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: As for the orphan, do not oppress him,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: and as for the beggar, scold him not;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: and as for thy Lord's blessing, declare it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Did We not expand thy breast for thee

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: and lift from thee thy burden,

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: the burden that weighed down thy back?

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: Did We not exalt thy fame?

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: So truly with hardship comes ease,

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: truly with hardship comes ease.'

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: So when thou art empty, labour,

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: and let thy Lord be thy Quest.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: and the Mount Sinai

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: and this land secure!

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: We indeed created Man in the fairest stature

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: then We restored him the lowest of the low --

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: save those who believe, and do righteous deeds; they shall have a wage unfailing.

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: What then shall cry thee lies as to the Doom?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not God the justest of judges?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Recite: In the Name of thy Lord who created,

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: created Man of a blood-clot.

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Recite: And thy Lord is the Most Generous,

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: who taught by the Pen,

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: taught Man that he knew not.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: No indeed; surely Man waxes insolent,

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: for he thinks himself self-sufficient.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely unto thy Lord is the Returning.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: What thinkest thou? He who forbids

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: a servant when he prays --

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: What thinkest thou? If he were upon guidance

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: or bade to godfearing --

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: What thinkest thou? If he cries lies, and turns away -

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Did he not know that God sees?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: No indeed; surely, if he gives not over, We shall seize him by the forelock,

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: a lying, sinful forelock.

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: So let him call on his concourse!

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We shall call on the guards of Hell.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: No indeed; do thou not obey him, and bow thyself, and draw nigh.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: Behold, We sent it down on the Night of Power;

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: And what shall teach thee what is the Night of Power?

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months;

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: in it the angels and the Spirit descend, by the leave of their Lord, upon every command.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: Peace it is, till the rising of dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: The unbelievers of the People of the Book and the idolaters would never leave off; till the Clear Sign came to them,

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: a Messenger from God, reciting pages purified,

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: therein true Books.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: And they scattered not, those that were given the Book, excepting after the Clear Sign came to them.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: They were commanded only to serve God, making the religion His sincerely, men of pure faith, and to perform the prayer, and pay the alms -- that is the religion of the True.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: The unbelievers of the People of the Book and the idolaters shall be in the Fire of Gehenna, therein dwelling forever; those are the worst of creatures.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: But those who believe, and do righteous deeds, those are the best of creatures;

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: their recompense is with their Lord-Gardens of Eden, underneath which rivers flow, therein dwelling for ever and ever. God is well-pleased with them, and they are well-pleased with Him; that is for him who fears his Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When earth is shaken with a mighty shaking

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: and earth brings forth her burdens,

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: and Man says., 'What ails her?'

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: upon that day she shall tell her tidings

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: for that her Lord has inspired her.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: Upon that day men shall issue in scatterings to see their works,

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: and whoso has done an atom's weight of good shall see it,

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: and whoso has done an atom's weight of evil shall see it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the snorting chargers,

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: by the strikers of fire,

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: by the dawn-raiders

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: blazing a trail of dust,

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: cleaving there with a host!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Surely Man is ungrateful to his Lord,

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: and surely he is a witness against that!

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Surely he is passionate in his love for good things.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Knows he not that when that which is in the tombs is over-thrown,

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: and that which is in the breasts is brought out --

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: surely on that day their Lord shall be aware of them!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The Clatterer!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the Clatterer?

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: And what shall teach thee what is the Clatterer?

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: The day that men shall be like scattered moths,

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: and the mountains shall be like plucked wool-tufts.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: Then he whose deeds weigh heavy in the Balance

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: shall inherit a pleasing life,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: but he whose deeds weigh light in the Balance

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: shall plunge in the womb of the Pit.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: And what shall teach thee what is the Pit?

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: A blazing Fire!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: Gross rivalry diverts you,

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: even till you visit the tombs.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed; but soon you shall know.

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again, no indeed; but soon you shall know.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: No indeed; did you know with the knowledge of certainty,

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: you shall surely see Hell;

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Again, you shall surely see it with the eye of certainty

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: then you shall be questioned that day concerning true bliss.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By the afternoon!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Surely Man is in the way of loss,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: save those who believe, and do righteous deeds, and counsel each other unto the truth, and counsel each other to be steadfast.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe unto every backbiter, slanderer,

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: who has gathered riches and counted them over

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: thinking his riches have made him immortal!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: No indeed; he shall be thrust into the Crusher;

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: and what shall teach thee what is the Crusher;

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: The Fire of God kindled

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: roaring over the hearts

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: covered down upon them,

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: in columns outstretched.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Hast thou not seen how thy Lord did with the Men of the Elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not make their guile to go astray?

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: And He loosed upon them birds in flights,

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: hurling against them stones of baked clay

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: and He made them like green blades devoured.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For the composing of Koraish,

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: their composing for the winter and summer caravan!

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: So let them serve the Lord of this House

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: who has fed them against hunger and secured them from fear.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Hast thou seen him who cries lies to the Doom?

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: That is he who repulses the orphan

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and urges not the feeding of the needy.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: So woe to those that pray

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: and are heedless of their prayers,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: to those who make display

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: and refuse charity.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: Surely We have given thee abundance;

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: so pray unto thy Lord and sacrifice.

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Surely he that hates thee, he is the one cut off.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say: 'O unbelievers,

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: I serve not what you serve

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: and you are not serving what I serve,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: nor am I serving what you have served,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: neither are you serving what I serve

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: To you your religion, and to me my religion!'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When comes the help of God, and victory,

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: and thou seest men entering God's religion in throngs,

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: then proclaim the praise of thy Lord, and seek His forgiveness; for He turns again unto men.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: Perish the hands of Abu Lahab, and perish he!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth avails him not, neither what he has earned;

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: he shall roast at a flaming fire

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: and his wife, the carrier of the firewood,

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: upon her neck a rope of palm-fibre.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say: 'He is God, One,

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: God, the Everlasting Refuge,

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: who has not begotten, and has not been begotten,

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: and equal to Him is not any one.'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of the Daybreak

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: from the evil of what He has created,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: from the evil of darkness when it gathers,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: from the evil of the women who blow on knots,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: from the evil of an envier when he envies.'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of men,

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: the King of men,

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: the God of men,

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: from the evil of the slinking whisperer

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: who whispers in the breasts of men

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: of jinn and men.'
